description:
Do you want to start speaking Chinese quickly and confidently? This course is designed to get you conversational in just one hour! Whether you’re preparing for a trip to China or simply want to impress your friends, you’ll learn key phrases to use in real-life situations.

Course Benefits:

  • Learn essential Chinese phrases for social settings.

  • Build confidence to hold basic conversations with native speakers.

  • Practice conversational Chinese without feeling overwhelmed by grammar or complex language rules.

What makes this course different?

  • Slow and Fast Reading: Follow along with both slow and fast-paced sentence readings, allowing you to imitate native pronunciation.

  • Detailed Notes: Each sentence comes with notes on individual words, helping you understand the full meaning and context.

  • Interactive Learning: Practice with carefully structured examples to ensure you feel comfortable speaking from day one.

What exactly will you learn in this course?

  • Master basic Chinese greetings, introductions, and common phrases in just one hour.

  • Understand each word’s meaning and context through detailed explanations and notes.

  • Practice your pronunciation with slow and fast-paced sentence readings.

  • Gain confidence to engage in daily conversations with native speakers.

Course Structure

  1. Introduction to Key Conversations

    • We’ll start with essential greetings and phrases to get you speaking immediately.

    • You’ll learn how to greet people in Chinese and ask basic questions.

  2. Slow and Fast-Paced Practice

    • We'll guide you through slow and fast-paced readings for each sentence.

    • This will help you perfect your pronunciation and gradually increase your speaking speed.

  3. Understanding Sentence Components

    • Every sentence we cover is broken down into individual words with detailed explanations.

    • You’ll understand not just how to say something but what each word means and how it fits into the sentence.

  4. Real-Life Conversations

    • You’ll practice conversations for common scenarios, such as introducing yourself, discussing the weather, and expressing gratitude.

    • These dialogues are designed to prepare you for real-world interactions.

  5. Master Key Phrases in 1 Hour

    • By the end of the course, you will have mastered the most essential Chinese phrases for everyday conversations—all in just one hour!

Ready to start speaking Chinese confidently? Join us now and master essential conversations in just one hour! Enroll today and begin your journey to fluency!

title: Practical Business Chinese Course level HSK3-HSK5

visible_instructors.title: Haoyeah Chinese Studio, Miss An M
visible_instructors.name: Haoyeah Chinese Studio, Miss An
visible_instructors.display_name: Haoyeah Chinese Studio, Miss An M
visible_instructors.job_title: Teacher of practical Chinese /Founder of Haoyeah Chinese

description:
This series is called 走进办公室 step in to the office, mainly about daily communication in the office. We will put ourselves in a series of real scenarios that we could actually experience in our daily work.


The series is led by 5 main scerios:

  • To start with, the first lesson presents the first meet with new coworkers, we will learn 1) how we give self-introduction, including your position, department, duties and even hobbies, 2)also some expressions that show your modesty which is part of culture in a chinese company;

  • The second lesson is about reporting a project, we will learn 1)how we report the progress of a project, possible difficulties, future plan and how we ask for support, 2)how we start a topic, 3)how we ask for and give opinion in Chinese;

  • The third lesson will lead us to the scenario of a video conference, we will learn1) expressions we are most likely to use throughout a conference, and 2)how we give explanation, 3)how we describe a process in Chinese;

  • When we come to the fourth lesson we will talk about pressure at work, 1)we will learn how we show cares to our colleagues, 2)how we ask for a leave, 3)how we make assumption and speculate the cause;

  • The theme of the last lesson is a glipse of a culture of Chinese companies, which is mainly about dining together, we will learn 1)why dining together is important, 2)what expressions would be helpful and appropirate to apply when you dine together with your boss or coworkers ;3)How we describe the frequency


The structure of each lesson:

Each lesson lasts 50~70min in total and consists of 6 parts:

1)The first part is introduction giving you the main idea of this scenario;

2)Part 2 and part 3 will equip you with around 10 key words which helps you get well prepared for other parts afterwards;

3)Part 4 is is the grammar part, there could be about 4-5 key grammars that we pick from the dialogue. I know many of you don’t show much interest in grammars, and it’s a course that mainly aims at expressing, but it’s highly recommended to go through this part for two reasons. Firstly, there are some conclusions or substitutes of certain expressions for certain scenario, you could learn couple of alternative ways to express the sam meaning. You could choose your favorite ones to use. Secondly, we will explain some important structures in the dialogue, with which you could easily create your own sentences and express your own idea in daily communication. So, sounds like it worths your time.

4)In part5 we will study the whole dialogue, meanwhile we will also review the new vocabulary and key grammars in previous parts of this lesson, which is a perfect process to check and memorize what we’ve learned.

5)Last but not least, we will provide you with 10 to 20 very practical supplementary expressions you are very likely to use in the scenario. We would like to encourage you to repeat out loud and to get familiar with the tones of each sentence. Hopefully, you could start to use them in your daily life right after the course.

Transiting from Upper Kindergarten (UKG) to Grade 1 will demand higher learning skills in all subjects. This course has been crafted to meet first-grade students' unique needs and developmental abilities, especially for the English Language.

In this course, We will introduce and reinforce essential literacy skills and concepts, allowing your child to develop a strong foundation in the English level needed for the Grade 1 level. You need not have to buy any books as this course has all the resources, like attractive videos and well-designed downloadable worksheets, that will complement your efforts to groom your child or students.

Grade 1 English has been designed in line with the global English language curriculum for Grade 1 ( or Class 1 ). This course has 70 + Videos and 100 + worksheets.

Let me share the topics given in the course

* Alphabetical Order

* Articles ( A, An, The )

* Naming Words ( People, Places, Animals, Things )

* Singular & Plural

* Pronoun

* Adjectives

* Verbs

* Preposition

* Conjunctions

* Opposites

* Punctuation

* How to frame Sentence

* How to make Questions

* Comprehension

* Picture Description

As parents or guardians, if you want to complement the teachers' work and provide enough practice for your child or want to give homeschooling for your child or student, then this course is perfect for you. Moreover, this course will give you more opportunities to nurture the loving bond between you and your child.

A strong foundation in English language skills is essential for future academic success. This course will help you as Parents or aspiring Teachers to create a supportive and enriching learning environment for your child.

Through this course, I, Jigna Patel, look forward to partnering with you in your journey to give your best to your child. Together, we can help them develop a lifelong love for English and communication.

title: Vocab Explained: Unlock the Secrets to Vocabulary Mastery
description:
In this course, you will learn English vocabulary (words related to people and their personalities among other subjects). With our approach, you will learn words and their meanings deeply and it will be easy for you to remember their meanings. We go far beyond the superficial definitions of a dictionary and teach you a way to learn words that you can apply throughout your English-learning journey.

With our way, you can unlock the meanings of hundreds of new words (even if you've never seen them before) just by learning a handful of words! And last but not least, you're gonna have a lot of fun learning with us because our videos use examples from TV shows and movies to better illustrate the meanings of words. And finally, we will test your understanding with practice exercises so that you can learn even better.

In total, you will learn about 100 words (33 main words about people, plus 37 related words about different topics, plus an extra ~30 words in practice exercises. Watch our introduction video to see our teaching methodology in action. We're so excited for you to learn new English words and grow your vocabulary!

P.S. Warning: Contains movie spoilers and some adult language (though it has been censored)

title: Chinese HSK 1 Course - Part 2, Learn 100 Chinese Sentences
description:
Hello everyone,


       As you know, China is among the most powerful countries, and therefore, the demand for China and Chinese is increasing day by day.  People generally think that Chinese is a very difficult language and they hesitate to start learning it. But Chinese is not as difficult a language as it seems. The characters are intimidating at first and are considered difficult to memorize. But as you will notice during the course and I will constantly emphasize, the characters are not that different from each other. During the tutorial I will talk about the relationships between the characters and it will be much easier to keep in mind that way.

       In this tutorial series, I will teach about 100 Chinese sentences. One of the most useful points of learning a language with sentences is that you will see the words you have learned in many different sentences, so it will be very difficult for you to forget and you will be able to understand them much more easily. Another point is that we will learn the sentences that you can use in daily conversation, that is, you will be able to use the sentences we learned directly from the stories or similar sentences when talking to a Chinese friend. This will allow you to speak fluently.


      I prepared this course for those who don't know anything about Chinese, so you don't need any foundation. Try to fully understand the sentences I have explained in the videos and do not hesitate to ask me about the points you do not understand. I will answer your questions with additional videos. I recommend that you work by typing the characters at the beginning. In this way, you will be able to grasp the structure of the characters much faster.

title: Spanish Grammar for Beginners – With Insights from Mexico
description:
Still confused about Spanish grammar—even after taking a beginner course? You’re not alone!

Hi, I’m Paulina! I’ve lived in Mexico and created this course for learners like you—people who’ve already started learning Spanish but still have questions about the grammar. Even native speakers sometimes struggle with grammar rules, so you’re not alone!

This course breaks things down in a simple, clear, and supportive way. I created each lesson with you in mind, so you can finally get the answers you've been looking for and build real confidence in your Spanish.

Spanish grammar is consistent across countries, but some things can vary depending on where you are. For example, verb conjugation and the use of tú and usted—both meaning “you”—can differ in formality and frequency across Spanish-speaking regions. This course offers context from Mexican Spanish to help you understand when and how these forms are typically applied, so you can communicate confidently and appropriately.

Whether you learned Spanish at school, through an app, or in a different country—this course will help solidify your grammar foundation. You’ll explore essential grammar concepts such as subject pronouns, the difference between ser and estar, and how possessive pronouns and adjectives work. We’ll also cover important details like the distinction between indefinite articles and numeral adjectives, pluralization rules, capitalization, and how accent marks can change a word’s meaning.

Let’s take the mystery out of Spanish grammar. Let’s do this!

title: Successful Responses to Listening Exam Pitfalls IGCSE-IELTS

visible_instructors.title: Waleed Elayan
visible_instructors.name: Waleed
visible_instructors.job_title: Successful Responses to Listening Exam Pitfalls

description:
The course - titled "Successful Responses to Listening Exam Pitfalls" (SRLEP)- is of a great benefit for students who want to boost their test scores in the IGCSE / IELTS listening exams. This course is unlike other listening courses students may have attended. This is because listening courses tell students to underline the key words and focus on the meanings reflected in other words like synonyms because the speakers rarely say the correct responses in a direct way. This is good, but what if learners didn't understand these words due to the fast speech and the rapidly changing ideas and attitudes in the speakers' talks and conversations?

For this reason, this course doesn't only focus on the meanings reflected in the synonyms or equivalents used by the speakers, but it also allows learners to identify the speakers' speech patterns that involve the correct answers as well as the speech patterns that involve the wrong responses to find out the strategies, categories, features and rules governing these patterns. You will be exposed to six strategies governing the speech patterns that involve the correct responses in addition to seven techniques governing the speech patterns that involve the pitfalls.

The introduction covers six strategies covering speech patterns relevant to accurate responses in listening exams. It outlines both the features of incorrect answers and highlighting pitfalls before delving into correct responses. Real conversation excerpts from past paper audio files demonstrate these pitfalls naturally. Following this, a thorough explanation of these pitfalls—including speech markers and associated rules—will be provided.

After you've identified all the pitfalls in the introduction, you will be introduced to the chapters 1-6. Each chapter will introduce a strategy involving the correct answers, its features and the speech markers associated with it.

Similarly, you will listen to excerpts from real recorded conversations taken from the audio files of past papers. Then you will be given a detailed description of the strategy such as the speech markers and the rules that characterize the correct response, in addition to an explanation on the features and markers of the pitfalls or distracting information.

title: Egyptian Arabic Course (A2.2)
description:
This course is for students who have been stuck at an upper-beginning level in Egyptian Arabic and want to take their Spoken Arabic to the next level.


In this course, we will study 16 texts that cover 16 different topics.


Each lesson comes in a PDF slideshow. A PDF slideshow starts with vocabulary with example sentences and pictures to reinforce the vocab in your memory.


Each PDF slideshow is accompanied by a video in which, I go over the whole slideshow.


The texts come in audio forms as well. Each text has two audio recordings: one fast and one slow.


At the end of each of the 16 slideshows, there’s a set of discussion questions that are either based on the vocabulary learned in the lesson, based on the topic of the lesson or are just inspired by the text.


Additionally, after each set of four lessons, we have a lesson that goes over the key vocabulary used in that set of lessons. This revision is done through four short texts. This makes the total number of lessons 20.


The purpose of this course is to get you exposed to authentic reading and listening material in Egyptian Arabic.


I hope you enjoy this course, and I’m eager to hear your feedback.


Happy learning!

Ahmad

title: Learn Hawaiian With Music
description:
Aloha kākou!

If you are one of those people who learn the best through music, this is the perfect course for you.

Research has found that those who are engaged in language learning are also generally musical people. I have personal experience in this field.


My personal experience:

I was learning Spanish in school, I had been learning it for a few years and had difficulties remembering new words and phrases. However, one day our teacher handed us a paper with the lyrics of a Spanish song. We translated it all together and then listened to the song, and I realised I remembered most of it.

After this, I started to learn all languages of interest this way.

Therefore, I feel confident telling you that this is a very useful and helpful way to learn the Hawaiian language as well.


In this course we will cover several Hawaiian songs by different singers.

Examples of songs:

  • E O Mai

  • Nani Ke Aloha

  • Ka Lei Mo'i

  • Pua Hinano

  • No Luna I Ka Halekai No ka Ma'alewa

  • Ka Lehua I Milia

I truly hope you will enjoy this course, as it also takes you on a journey to experience the Hawaiian music.

Let's all take the time to start this journey and learn a new wonderful language together!
headline: The perfect course for learning Hawaiian for music lovers!
requirements_data: Completed Basic Hawaiian Grammar course is recommended but not required.
what_you_will_learn_data: Have a broader vocabulary
Understand your favourite songs
Improve pronunciation
Better understand the grammatical structure

Music lovers

description:
**Ready to Speak Arabic with Confidence?** 


This course is your ultimate guide to mastering the most commonly used Arabic phrases for everyday conversations! Whether you're a beginner or someone looking to enhance their Arabic skills, this course is designed to make learning Arabic easy, practical, and enjoyable. 


### **What You'll Learn:** 

- Over 100 essential Arabic phrases for daily communication. 

- Translations for every phrase in **English, French, and Spanish**. 

- Pronunciation tips to help you speak like a native. 

- Real-life scenarios to build your confidence in speaking. 


### **Why Choose This Course?** 

- **Interactive Learning:** Engaging lessons that include visuals and repetition techniques to help you remember phrases easily. 

- **Multilingual Support:** Clear translations in three languages for better understanding. 

- **Practical Focus:** Learn phrases you'll actually use in everyday situations, from ordering coffee to asking for directions. 

- **Self-Paced Learning:** Study at your own pace and revisit lessons anytime. 


### **Who Is This Course For?** 

- **Travelers:** Navigate Arabic-speaking countries with confidence. 

- **Students:** Add Arabic to your skillset and open doors to new opportunities. 

- **Language Enthusiasts:** Broaden your cultural knowledge and communication skills. 


### **What Makes This Course Unique?** 

This course doesn't just teach you words—it teaches you how to communicate effectively in real-life situations. With fun, interactive examples and practical phrases, you'll feel confident speaking Arabic in no time! 


**Join now** and start speaking Arabic with ease! By the end of this course, you'll have a solid foundation to engage in simple conversations, connect with Arabic speakers, and explore the language like never before. 


**Sign up today and take the first step on your Arabic language journey!**

description:
Are you terrified of the IELTS Speaking test? Master IELTS Speaking with GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice is your ultimate solution. This isn't just another course; it's a complete, AI-Driven IELTS Prep system designed to give you unshakable Public Speaking Confidence and help you achieve Top IELTS Scores. You will use revolutionary GenAI AI Role-Play to simulate the real exam, get instant feedback, and finally conquer the test.

This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.

For most candidates, the IELTS Speaking test is the single most stressful part of the exam. The pressure of a live examiner, the fear of your mind going blank, and the challenge of speaking fluently for 14 minutes can be overwhelming.

How can you possibly practice for this? Practicing alone doesn't work. Practicing with friends is helpful, but they aren't trained examiners. Hiring a private tutor for daily practice is incredibly expensive and difficult to schedule.

This is the exact problem this course was built to solve.

Welcome to Master IELTS Speaking with GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice. We have combined expert IELTS training with cutting-edge Generative AI technology to create the most effective AI-Driven IELTS Prep tool on the market.

This course gives you a 24/7, on-demand, non-judgmental practice partner. Our GenAI AI Role-Play system features AI avatars that simulate real IELTS examiners. They will ask you questions, listen to your answers, and provide instant, detailed feedback on your performance. This is the only way to build true fluency and Public Speaking Confidence before you ever walk into the test center.


What You’ll Learn


By the end of this course, you will be able to:

  • Master the IELTS Speaking test format for all three parts (Interview, Cue Card, and Discussion) for both Academic and General Training.

  • Achieve Top IELTS Scores by deeply understanding and mastering the four official scoring criteria: Fluency & Coherence, Lexical Resource (Vocabulary), Grammatical Range & Accuracy, and Pronunciation.

  • Gain true Public Speaking Confidence by practicing in a realistic, simulated test environment with our GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice system.

  • Develop advanced vocabulary and idiomatic language that impresses examiners and naturally boosts your Lexical Resource score.

  • Correct your pronunciation, intonation, and stress to ensure your speech is clear, natural, and easy to understand.

  • Practice with over 100+ complete sample IELTS Speaking tests, giving you endless opportunities to prepare for any topic that comes your way.

  • Receive instant, personalized AI feedback after every GenAI AI Role-Play session, identifying your exact weaknesses and showing you how to fix them.

  • Learn advanced techniques for extending your answers, structuring your Part 2 "Cue Card" speech, and engaging in high-level discussions in Part 3.


How Our Revolutionary GenAI AI Role-Play System Works


This is the core of your AI-Driven IELTS Prep. This is what sets this course apart and will give you an unstoppable advantage.

  1. Realistic Simulations: You won't just watch videos. You will engage in interactive GenAI AI Role-Play sessions. An AI avatar will act as your examiner, asking you questions from all three parts of the test, just like the real thing.

  2. Instant, Detailed Feedback: As soon as you finish a role-play, our GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice system analyzes your performance. It provides a detailed breakdown of your strengths and weaknesses across all four scoring criteria, giving you actionable advice for improvement.

  3. 24/7 Availability: Your AI examiner is ready whenever you are. Practice at 3 AM or on your lunch break. You get unlimited practice without the scheduling nightmares or high costs of a human tutor.

  4. A Judgment-Free Zone: The fear of making mistakes kills fluency. Our GenAI AI Role-Play system allows you to practice, fail, and improve without any fear or embarrassment, building your Public Speaking Confidence faster than any other method.


A Look Inside Your AI-Driven IELTS Prep Curriculum


This comprehensive course (45+ hours, 45+ role-plays, 100+ sample tests) is structured to take you from a nervous beginner to a confident, high-scoring speaker.

Section 1: Foundations of IELTS Speaking with GenAI AI Role-Play Practice

  • This section is your foundation for success. We'll start by deconstructing the IELTS Speaking test. You'll learn the format, the "rules" of the test, and exactly what examiners are looking for.

  • You'll get a full tutorial on our GenAI AI Role-Play system, so you can get comfortable with the technology and start practicing from day one.

  • We'll cover the core strategies for Part 1 (Daily Life, Work, Study) and show you how to give extended, fluent answers.

Section 2: Comprehensive IELTS Speaking Practice Tests with AI Role-Play

  • This is your deep-practice module. Here, you will master all the most common IELTS topics. For each topic, you get an expert lecture followed by targeted GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice.

  • Topics covered include: Hometown, Education, Hobbies, Travel, Technology, Environment, Family, Work, Food, and Culture. You will be prepared for anything they ask you.

Section 3: Advanced IELTS Speaking Techniques with GenAI AI Role-Play

  • This module is designed to help you achieve Top IELTS Scores (Band 7, 8, or 9). We move beyond the basics and into advanced strategies.

  • You will learn specific techniques to master Fluency (using fillers and linking words), Vocabulary (using less common and idiomatic language), and Pronunciation (mastering intonation and word stress).

  • You'll complete advanced GenAI AI Role-Play sessions that challenge you to use these new skills in real-time.

Section 4: Sample IELTS Speaking Tests with Downloadable Audio Files

  • This is your ultimate exam simulation library. You gain access to a massive repository of 100+ full-length sample IELTS Speaking tests.

  • You can use these to simulate full test conditions and track your progress.

  • Each test includes model answers and downloadable audio files, allowing you to study offline, on your commute, or anywhere you go.


Who Should Enroll in This Course?


This course is a perfect fit for you if:

  • You are an IELTS Candidate (Academic or General Training) who is serious about achieving Top IELTS Scores and needs a structured, effective preparation plan.

  • You are an English Learner who wants to dramatically improve your fluency, pronunciation, and vocabulary for any personal or professional goal.

  • You are a Professional or Student who needs to develop strong Public Speaking Confidence for presentations, interviews, and meetings.

  • You have taken the IELTS test before but failed to get the Speaking score you needed.

  • You are a busy individual who needs a flexible, self-paced, and affordable AI-Driven IELTS Prep solution that actually works.


Benefits Beyond Just the IELTS Exam


While our primary goal is to help you Master IELTS Speaking, the skills you learn here will last a lifetime. This course will:

  • Boost your academic success by giving you the confidence to participate in university discussions and presentations.

  • Accelerate your professional growth by helping you communicate clearly and persuasively in interviews and meetings.

  • Enhance your daily communication, allowing you to engage in fluent, natural conversations in any English-speaking environment.


Your Journey to Top IELTS Scores Starts Now


Don't let the IELTS Speaking test stand between you and your dreams. With expert guidance from instructors Iftekhar Rahman and Iftekar Showeb, and the revolutionary power of our GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice, you have the ultimate tool for success.

Stop practicing in your head. Start practicing in a realistic, AI-powered environment that gives you the feedback you need to improve.

Enroll in Master IELTS Speaking with GenAI-Powered Role-Play Practice today, and gain the skills, the strategy, and the Public Speaking Confidence to walk into that exam and get the Top IELTS Scores you deserve.

Click "Enroll Now" and let's start your transformation.
headline: Master IELTS Speaking via GenAI AI Role-Play for Public Speaking Confidence Top IELTS Scores with AI-Driven IELTS Prep
requirements_data: Basic English Proficiency: This course requires only a basic understanding of English, equivalent to CEFR A2 or higher, to follow instructions and participate in simple conversations. Whether you’re new to English or already comfortable with basic communication, the course starts with foundational lessons and progresses gradually to advanced techniques. The GenAI role-play system provides clear prompts and tailored feedback, making it easy for beginners to build confidence and for intermediate learners to refine their skills. This minimal language requirement ensures that anyone motivated to improve their speaking can dive in without feeling overwhelmed.

Internet-Connected Device: To access the course’s online platform, you’ll need a computer, tablet, or smartphone with a stable internet connection. With over 45 hours of video lectures and interactive GenAI role-play sessions delivered online, this requirement ensures you can fully engage with the content. Most learners already own a suitable device, removing any significant barriers. The course’s cloud-based delivery means no complex software installations are needed, making it straightforward for beginners to get started with their IELTS Speaking preparation.

Microphone and Speakers/Headphones: A device equipped with a microphone (built-in or external) and speakers or headphones is essential for participating in the GenAI-powered speaking practice sessions. These tools allow you to interact with AI avatars that simulate IELTS examiners, mimicking real test conditions. Since most modern devices come with built-in microphones and speakers, this requirement is easily met by beginners and advanced learners alike. The setup ensures you can practice speaking and receive audio feedback seamlessly, enhancing your fluency and pronunciation.

PDF Reader for Course Materials: You’ll need a free PDF reader, such as Adobe Acrobat Reader, to access downloadable course materials, including 200 sample IELTS Speaking Tests with model answers. These resources enable offline practice and help you compare your responses with high-scoring examples. PDF readers are widely available at no cost, ensuring that even beginners can easily access and utilize these valuable materials. This requirement supports self-paced learning, allowing you to study whenever and wherever suits you best.

Motivation to Practice Regularly: The only non-technical requirement is a willingness to engage with the course’s interactive role-plays and apply the GenAI feedback to improve. Consistent practice is crucial for mastering fluency, vocabulary, and pronunciation for the IELTS Speaking Test. The course’s self-paced format, lifetime access, and supportive AI system make it easy to stay motivated, even for beginners with no prior IELTS experience. This flexibility ensures that learners of all backgrounds can commit to their goals and achieve success in the IELTS Speaking Test or general English communication.

title: Learn Korean Alphabet (Hangeul): A Complete Beginner's Guide

visible_instructors.title: Sean Kim
visible_instructors.name: Sean
visible_instructors.job_title: 10+ Years Korean Language Instructor | CEO of SEANY KOREAN

description:
Welcome to "Learn Korean Alphabet (Hangeul): A Complete Beginner's Guide"! I'm Sean, the CEO of SEANY KOREAN with over 10 years of experience teaching Korean to learners worldwide. I’m excited to be your guide as you embark on this exciting journey of learning the Korean language. I’ve designed this course to be simple, fun, and highly effective.


This course is perfect for beginners who want to learn how to read and write in Korean. You’ll start by mastering Hangeul, the Korean alphabet, through step-by-step lessons. We’ll guide you from basic vowels and consonants to more advanced concepts like double consonants and final sounds. Each lesson is designed to be engaging and easy to follow, with plenty of practice exercises and quizzes to reinforce your learning.


By the end of this course, you’ll be able to confidently read and pronounce Korean words, laying the foundation for further language study.


[What you'll learn]

  • Vowels: Learn the sounds and shapes of Korean vowels.

  • Consonants: Discover the basic building blocks of Korean words.

  • More Vowels: Dive deeper into vowels and their combinations.

  • Double Consonants: Understand how some consonants work together.

  • Final Consonants: Learn about the sounds that end Korean words.

  • Practice: Get plenty of practice and quizzes to improve.


I’m so excited to join you on this journey to mastering the Korean alphabet (Hangeul)! Learning a new language is always an adventure, and I know that with the tools and practice provided in this course, you’ll make great progress.

Take your time, enjoy the process, and remember that I’m here to support you every step of the way. I can’t wait to see how far you’ll go, and I’m confident you’ll soon be reading and pronouncing Korean with ease.


Let’s dive in together and make learning Korean both fun and rewarding!

title: Standard Chinese Beginner Course HSK 1 Learn Mandarin Chines
description:
Are you struggling to find the right way to start learning Chinese？

Does your busy schedule make it difficult to attend a traditional Chinese school or hire a tutor？


Look no further – this course is the solution for you!


This comprehensive course will help you learn Chinese from scratch, step by step. You will find no pressure in learning this course because each session is designed to be less than 7 minutes. You can conveniently fit learning into even the busiest of days.

Regardless of your starting point, this course is designed to take you from zero to being able to confidently pass the Chinese Proficiency Test level 1 (HSK 1 test) if you want.

Not only will you master the basics of Chinese, but you'll also develop a solid understanding of Chinese word order and sentence structure. 

By the end of the course, you will be able to effortlessly understand and use basic Chinese phrases and expressions while also being able to read and write simple Chinese characters.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to support and guide you along the way.

Imagine the sense of accomplishment and the amazing opportunities that await you as you unlock the doors to the fascinating Chinese language!

Course Content:


  • The Full Chinese Pronunciation Course for Beginners

  • The Detailed Explanation for 45 Daily Conversations

  • 52 Simplified Chinese Grammar Elaboration

  • 15 Chinese Speaking Instructions

  • 15 Textbook Exercise Tutorials

  • 30 stroke-by-stroke writing instructions 

Additional Learning Materials (Attached in the end of the course):


  • HSK1 Standard Course Textbook (PDF & MP3)

  • HSK1 Standard Course Workbook (PDF & MP3)

  • 10 Past HSK 1 Test Papers with Answers & Listening Scripts (PDF & MP3)

ENROLL NOW for one hour with a tutor to learn Chinese with A STAR TEACHER throughout the complete HSK 1 course!

title: Business English for Jobs & Networking
description:
Strong English and a confident presence are career accelerators. This practical Business English course gives you a complete toolkit for high-stakes communication—introductions, emails, calls, meetings, presentations, and networking—grounded in UK workplace norms yet fully applicable in global settings.


Through focused lessons, real examples, and guided practice, you’ll learn how to speak with clarity, write with purpose, and build professional relationships that advance your goals.


Why This Course Matters


Even talented professionals hesitate to speak up, worry about language accuracy, or avoid networking altogether. These barriers cost opportunities and confidence.


This course tackles those pain points head-on—combining essential Business English with proven networking and relationship-building strategies—so you can communicate clearly, handle sensitive interactions, and expand your influence across cultures.


By mastering these skills, you’ll be able to:


  • Contribute confidently in meetings and client calls.

  • Write emails that get read—and acted on.

  • Navigate cultural nuances without missteps.

  • Build and sustain a high-value professional network.


What Makes This Course Unique?


Unlike generic language courses, this program is built around real workplace scenarios—emails, calls, meetings, interviews, pitches, and networking events—so you can apply skills immediately.

This Course Includes the Following Sections


1. Introduction to Workplace English: Understand the role of English in UK and global workplaces; distinguish formal vs. informal tone and when to use each.


2. Professional Greetings & Introductions: Deliver polished self-introductions, introduce others smoothly, and open conversations that lead somewhere.


3.Telephone Etiquette & Call Management: Plan, open, steer, and close calls; take messages, escalate issues, and handle difficult conversations with tact.


4. Writing Professional Emails: Structure and style for clarity; subject lines, tone, requests, and follow-ups that move work forward.


5. Cross-Cultural Communication: Decode cultural differences in directness, feedback, and meeting styles; use strategies for respectful, effective collaboration.


6.Networking Skills: Prepare talking points, ask smart questions, and create value; follow up without being pushy.


7. Handling Difficult Conversations: Language and frameworks for delivering bad news, giving feedback, pushing back, and de-escalating tension.


8. Understanding Workplace Jargon Use common UK workplace idioms and phrases appropriately; avoid buzzword traps; clarify meaning with confidence.


9. Digital Communication Etiquette: Best practices for chat, email threads, and video meetings; camera, mic, and meeting-room professionalism.


10. Overcoming Mental Barriers to Networking: Techniques to manage anxiety, fear of rejection, and imposter syndrome; build a sustainable practice habit.


11. Networking Mindset & Relationship Management: Active listening, value creation, contact management, and follow-up cadences that strengthen relationships.


12. First Impressions That Win: Openings, body language, and small talk that build credibility—online and in person.


13. Refine Your Professional Presence: Culturally appropriate ways to greet, engage, and close; aligning words, tone, and non-verbal cues.


14. Building Your Professional Brand: Craft your elevator pitch; improve proposals and introductions; optimize LinkedIn and other profiles for a consistent, professional image.

Disclaimer: This course contains the use of artificial intelligence. While the course's foundational content and voiceover are crafted by the course creator, AI tools have been used to improve the voice quality and polish the script for enhanced delivery and engagement.

title: Irish Language Mastery
description:
This course Irish Language Mastery - Not for the Faint-hearted is for those students who wish to get to grips with the Verbal Noun. In order to speak fluently and to have meaningful conversations in the Irish language students must be familiar with the verbal noun and the word order in purpose clauses. We explore the differences between transitive,  intransitive and phrasal verbs. Rules regarding word order are explained thoroughly. Techniques are given to students which will help them to identify the correct verbal noun endings.

Now that students are familiar with the Copula in the Present Tense, the Past Tense Copula of Categorization is introduced. Clear and detailed explanations are a feature of this course. Students are encouraged to listen to lectures multiple times until they have mastered the grammatical concept in question. Laura also encourages students to re-do tests until they feel completely at ease with the new concerned.

The theme running through this Master Course is that of crime. As an avid true crime podcast listener, Laura seeks to share her specialist vocabulary with students so that they can discuss what they are watching and listening to.

This course is best undertaken following or in conjunction with the Advanced Class. The best of luck! Le dea-ghuí, Laura.
headline: Not for the Faint-Hearted!

title: Az angol nyelvtan, társalgási témák
description:
Kurzusomban először az angol igeidők szerkezetét, használatát mutatom be. A kurzust a jelen idők bemutatásával kezdem, majd a múlt és végül a jövő időket tanítom meg. Powerpoint segítségével prezentálom az egyes igeidők képzését, és  a mondatban való elhelyezkedését. Kitérek az igeidők tagadó, kérdő szerkezetére is. Mindegyik igeidőnél beszélek a helyes használatról, ill. használatuk körülményeiről. Igyekszek rávilágítani a használatuk közötti különbségre, példamondatokkal illusztrálva azt.

Az igeidőket követően bemutatom azokat a nyelvtani szerkezeteket, amelyek az igeidőkre alapoznak. Tehát az igeidők ismerete nélkül nem tudod őket használni, megalkotni. Ezek pl. a szenvedő szerkezet, a függő beszéd, a feltételes mód.

Ezt követően szóbeli témák kidolgozását bemutató videókat nézhetsz meg. Ezekben a videókban összegyűjtöm az adott témához szükséges szókincset, kifejezéseket, nyelvtani szerkezeteket. Ezen kívül minden videó tartalmaz egy kidolgozott témát, amelyet segítségül felhasználhatsz a saját monológod kidolgozásához.

A megértés teszteléséhez minden oktató videó alatt gyakorló feladatokat osztok meg, amelyeken keresztül a diákok gyakorolhatják a tanultakat, majd le is ellenőrizhetik megoldásaikat.

Elsődleges célom, hogy segítséget nyújtsak a diákoknak mind a nyelvtan, mind a szókincs helyes használatában úgy a mindennapi életben, mint vizsgahelyzetben.

Várom visszajelzéseiteket, mi tetszett, mit javítsak, vagy mit csináljak másképp. Célom, hogy minél több érdeklődő diákot sikeressé tegyek az angol nyelv megértésében és használatában.

Jó tanulást, jó munkát kívánok mindenkinek!
headline: Igeidők, igeidőkön alapuló szerkezetek, társalgási témák
requirements_data: Ezt a kurzust teljesen kezdők is elkezdhetik, de előny, ha van egy alap szókincs, és alap nyelvtani ismeret (személyes névmások, többes szám, birtokosság kifejezése, stb.)

target_audiences: Kezdőknek és haladóknak egyaránt ajánlom, hiszen az igeidőket az alapoknál kezdem, amelyet még a kezdő szinten levők is könnyedén elsajátítanak,de a végén eljutunk addig is, amivel érettségi vizsgán, ill. nyelvvizsgán találkozhatnak a diákok.

title: Gain Confidence speaking with Native English Speakers
description:
This course had been especially designed for English language learners who want to dramatically improve their understanding of fast and Natural English that is spoken by native English speakers.

It consists of many short everyday conversations that take place in a variety of scenarios between various speakers including - Family life; Dealing with businesses such as call centres; shopping; holidays etc.

These interactions have been written to include many commonly used words, phrases, idioms and expressions in order to greatly assist in the students understanding of English conversation in the real world and outside of a classroom setting.

After each conversation, the vocabulary used will be discussed in detail with additional examples being given, in a comprehensive and fun way. This will further assist in the learners broader understanding of spoken English.

Also included are many pronunciation tips in order to help the student not only understand native British speakers but also sound like them.

Special emphasis here will be placed on English that is spoken in a natural fast way that so many students of English struggle with. Finally there are further videos that allow the student to take part in the conversations they have just watched, as they take the place of one of the participants, which will really boost their speaking confidence.
headline: Boost your English language Vocabulary and Pronunciation, Listening and Speaking skills with real British Conversations
requirements_data: This course is NOT for beginners - Some knowledge of English is required
You must be willing  to take part in the Exercises and Conversations to get the most benefit

Learn how to pronounce English like native English Speakers with a British accent
Be able to take part in a real English conversation with confidence
target_audiences: This course is ideal for intermediate to advanced English learners who want to quickly improve their English Listening and Speaking skills  to Native level.
objectives: How to understand fast natural English
Learn everyday English Words and Expressions
Learn how to pronounce English like native English Speakers with a British accent

Do you want to learn Ukrainian — but don’t know where to start?
This beginner-friendly course is designed to help you build a strong foundation in the Ukrainian language from day one.

description:
Learning a new language can open doors to education, career opportunities, and personal growth – and German is one of the most valuable languages to master in today’s world. Whether you’re preparing to study abroad, work in a German-speaking country, or simply want to expand your horizons, this beginner-friendly course will help you build a strong foundation in German quickly and effectively.


Are you a complete beginner who dreams of speaking German with confidence?

This course is your perfect starting point!


In just one week, you’ll learn the essential building blocks of the German language – including the alphabet, basic greetings, fundamental grammar (pronouns, verbs “sein” and “haben”), and practical vocabulary (numbers, days, food, colors, family).


This course is based on a structured book created by the instructor and includes:


Clear and simple video lessons

Real-life examples and native pronunciation

Slide-based explanations for visual learners

Easy vocabulary you can start using immediately

A step-by-step approach for fast and effective learning


Whether you’re learning German for school, work, travel, or just for fun – this course will guide you from zero to confident beginner.


No prior knowledge required. Just bring your curiosity and let’s start learning German together!


By the end of this course, you’ll be able to read, understand, and speak basic German with clarity. You’ll gain the confidence to introduce yourself, hold simple conversations, and build on your knowledge with ease. Join today and start your German journey!

title: More Random Errors
description:
This course is the sequel to The Most Common Mistakes in English, which is one of my most popular courses. In every lecture, we go through the typical errors that I hear from my EFL students. I am a British teacher with 25 years of experience, and I still teach students in private classes every week, from my website. The course is aimed at intermediate-level students who want to progress quickly to the advanced level.

This course includes the following resources:


  • 20 lectures and 20 quizzes

  • Lectures cover the most typical mistakes with tenses, vocabulary, prepositions, modals, articles, countability, word order, gerunds, infinitives, conditionals, and pronunciation

  • After each lecture, a quiz follows which tests your understanding of the lesson, helping you avoid the most common mistakes, and thereby improving your conversational skills

  • Ask me questions on those topics which cause the most confusion, and I answer all your questions within 24 hours on the Q and A section. I will be with you at every step of this course

  • Lifetime membership (more lessons and resources added every month)

By the end of the course, you will have mastered the most useful grammar and vocabulary that is necessary to speak English fluently

title: Learn Marathi Easy Way - Level 2

visible_instructors.title: Avdhut Haldankar
visible_instructors.name: Avdhut
visible_instructors.job_title: Native speaker and Language Instructor of Marathi language

description:
Congratulations on finishing the level 1 of Learn Marathi With Us course! Now its  time to sharpen your Marathi language skills even further!

Or are your new here? As far as you have some basic knowledge knowledge of Marathi language and you are eager to learn it further, do enroll to this course!

Marathi is the official language of the state of Maharashtra, in India, which is home to India's mega cities, Mumbai and Pune. Marathi is spoken by over 80 million people around the world, which puts Marathi in the list of top 20 most spoken languages in the world.

Often learning a new language becomes challenging as you don't have the right resources, nor the right technique. Proper guidance too, plays a crucial role while learning a language.

Being the native Marathi speaker, I have decided to help those who want to learn Marathi, to overcome these hurdles. That's why I have come up with this course, which aims at simplifying the process of learning Marathi language.

This course uses the practical methods of teaching a language. In order to understand the grammatical concepts better way, we will study the sentences, dialogues and conversations, which we use in our daily lives. With the help of these sentences, you are read-to-go to speak Marathi with others in the Real-World situations!

The major added benefit of this course is going to be that you will be able to solve your doubts with me through my Instagram handle!

So I welcome you all to join this course, to begin your journey with me, to speak Marathi!

This is going to be a 15 lectures series and as of September 2023, there are 5 lectures available already! I will be trying to upload at least 1 video every week!


Who should get this course?

  • Those who have finished studying Level 1 of this course.

  • Those who have some basic knowledge of Marathi language and they want to learn further in English.


Following topics will be covered over a period of time;

  • Adjectives

  • Adverbs

  • Vocabulary

  • Relative Pronouns

  • Future and Past Tenses

  • Comparative and Superlative sentence formation

  • Cause and Consequence sentence formation

  • Conditional sentences

  • Gerundive Form

  • Discussions over sample dialogues and conversations

Have you ever considered learning Ukrainian? Spoken by over 20 million people, Ukrainian is a language rich in history, culture, and tradition. Ukrainian is a Slavic language, distinct in its pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar. With its melodic sound and straightforward structure, Ukrainian is both beautiful and approachable for learners of all levels.

In this course, we’ll take you step by step through the essentials of Ukrainian. You’ll start with greetings, introductions, and essential everyday vocabulary. As you progress, you’ll learn how to build sentences, use important verbs, and express yourself confidently in real-life situations.   • Grammar essentials like verb conjugation and adjective agreement

After completing this course, you will be able to:

  • Navigate common situations such as shopping or discussing the weather

  • Use basic Ukrainian grammar and vocabulary to express yourself

title: Learn the Russian Alphabet in Under 2 Hours
description:
Learning Russian is really difficult, right? Wrong!

Just because it uses a script different from your own, it shouldn’t be seen as a huge obstacle.

My Russian Alphabet course makes learning Russian letters fun, easy, and convenient — whether at home or on the go, you’ll progress fast with this audiovisual course.

To design this course, I drew from my extensive experience as a Russian language tutor and translator. Fundamentally, we learn through repetition and connection. This course focuses more on making connections that will help you remember Russian letters more easily and quickly.

Some of the techniques I used were:

  • Breaking down Russian letters into meaningful chunks

  • Drawing memorable illustrations

  • Storytelling

  • Audio pronunciation

  • Quizzes

  • Russian calligraphy practice worksheets

Once you've completed the course, you can recognise all the letters of the Russian alphabet. You're now able to read and write Russian (including the Russian cursive). Most importantly, you're then ready to learn the language itself. Start with a beginner Russian course.

This is what my students who completed the course say:

"As someone that had tried numerous resources to self-teach the Russian alphabet, I found it incredibly difficult to memorise. However, having completed this course, I genuinely do feel a noticeable improvement very quickly in my ability to read Russian text, which I feel will be strengthened with repetition and increased exposure to Russian Reading.

The course is fantastic, and would highly recommend it. The organiser of the course, Yana, is also absolutely fantastic as a tutor and would definitely recommend her to anyone wanting to learn this beautiful language." — Ravi, England.

"I loved the Russian Alphabet course and thought it was very clear. I definitely found this approach very helpful and easier to digest. Great audio and fab style of illustrations definitely made me learn it faster. It took me 2 hours to complete the course, not long at all. I can now read Russian! I got 80% in the quiz, with only one word wrong in the last section - so I’m very happy! My next steps in learning Russian is having lessons with Yana to help me with my conversation, reading, and grammar (I’ve had a couple already, and they have been great!). I would definitely recommend the course to other students." — Amy, England.

"I found the Russian Alphabet course very engaging. It's really straightforward and well-structured. In this course, the Russian alphabet is broken down into meaningful chunks. For example, the letter "Ж" in TreaЖure. It took me about 2 hours to complete the course. I can now read Russian, even if slowly. I would highly recommend this course to anybody. Even my boyfriend got hooked and sat next to me, learning the Russian letters with me. He too found it really engaging and fun. " — Andrea, Hungary

Good luck!

title: 3 Minute German - Course 7 | Language lessons for beginners

visible_instructors.title: Kieran Ball
visible_instructors.name: Kieran
visible_instructors.job_title: Creator of the "3 Minute Languages" series of courses

description:
Welcome to course 7 :-)

Man sagt, dass die Sieben eine Glückszahl ist, und in Deutschland, gilt die Zahl 7 manchmal als “magische Zahl” oder als Heilig.

It is said that seven is a lucky number, and in Germany, the number 7 is sometimes considered a "magic number" or sacred.

Well, that might be going a bit far, but I do think course 7 is a wonderful addition to the 3 Minute German series, although I am obviously biased since I wrote it!

In this course, which contains lessons 54 to 62, we're going to be looking at lots of useful language features and further building our German vocabulary to enable us to speak in even more situations.

What will I learn?

To begin with, we'll be looking at more areas where German and English differ slightly, and why you can't always translate things word-for-word. The word "woher" for instance, is a new question word we can use when we want to say "where ... from" in English.

We're going to get quite a few new Vocabulary Expansion Sheets in this course, which will give us the opportunity to add more description to our language. We'll learn the words letze and nächste, as well as lots of new adverbs such as seit, bis and vor.

Course 7 comes with a new tense; we've looked at the present perfect tense in quite some detail now, so in this course we're going to move on and look at the present tense. As the name suggests, this tense will allow us to talk about what's happening in the present. We'll look at how to form the present tense for "Sie" using regular verbs and then we'll have a look at the group of irregular verbs who do their own things. We'll also look at another tense that is linked to the present tense: the imperative.

The imperative is the grammatical term for "commands", so you can use it to tell people what to do, or equally what not to do. This is quite a simple tense to learn once you've got to grips with the present tense.

So, that's a little bit about what you'll be learning in this seventh course, but of course there's lots more, including new verbs, new adjectives and adverbs, talking about the calendar in German and looking at some new structures as well as revamping some old structures.

I hope you enjoy :-)

title: Norwegian Grammar That Matters: Overcoming Common Mistakes
description:
Beginner to Intermediate Norwegian learners:
If I offered to make the most useful grammar in Norwegian clear for you:

- in a down-to-earth and easily digestible way (short videos, simple PDFs, and quizzes)
- without needing to feel overwhelmed
- so you can start speaking and writing Norwegian NOW with confidence
… Would you take me up on it?

I have helped over 100 students build their foundation to speak and write more easily. Here's what one of my recent students thought about me as a teacher:

"Morten's lessons have been incredibly helpful to me in various ways. His teaching approach is exceptional, making complex concepts easy to understand. He creates a positive and engaging learning environment, which has greatly enhanced my learning experience. I highly recommend him." - Marco (Garmany)

I have spent countless hours refining and gathering the best and most important lessons that I taught Marco and other students like him, which I have all included in the course Norwegian Grammar That Matters: Overcoming Common Mistakes.

Are you next?

In this course, we seek to provide you with the essentials of Norwegian grammar, so that you may speak and write the language with confidence! Follow us step by step to help you become dominant in the field of Norwegian grammar while getting training on how to integrate and apply it. Quickly learn the most important areas that we use in our everyday lives. Key areas from general greetings to verbs and nouns will be covered here as we set out to deliver a to-the-point package to avoid common mistakes and start speaking fluently to achieve your goals in life.


The course will be broken down into different modules.


-The first module will act like a starting kit where beginners can get a thorough welcome to the language. This will include general introductions, personal pronouns, question words, pronunciation tips as well as present tense verb conjugation.


-The second module will take one further down the verb path with auxiliary verbs.


-The third module will unravel the mysteries of past tense conjugation.


-The fourth module will shed light on future tense conjugation.


-The fifth module will look at nouns. The different genders of nouns in Norwegian and how to conjugate them.


-The sixth module will feature everything you need to know about adjectives and their conjugation.


-The seventh module is closely linked to adjectives as you will find out, as it will be looking at adverbs.


-The eighth module takes you on the complex, yet exciting journey of our prepositions.


-The ninth module deals with prepositions again, yet this time it is time prepositions.


-The tenth module showcases a highlight among classic mistakes many Norwegian learners make. It is time for the Verb-subject switch.


-The eleventh module revolves around various pronoun forms and here they are all collected together to make it easier.


-The twelfth and final module will provide the tools needed for utilizing the passive forms of verbs.

+ Lastly, we have added a 12-lesson bonus course to empower you to integrate and apply the grammar that you have learned in various typical life situations with follow-along speaking training!

I hope this will be the beginning of a turning point in your mastery of Norwegian.

Hilsen,
Morten
Norwegian Speaking Lessons (NSL)

title: Vietnamese pronunciation 101 (Southern Accent)

visible_instructors.name: Pham Vi
visible_instructors.job_title: Native speaker with enthusiasm to share language and culture

description:
Hey, welcome to Vietnamese Pronunciation 101 – your passport to sounding like a local rockstar! We're not just teaching, we're throwing a language party, and you're invited.

First up, we're diving into the world of tones – the secret sauce that gives Vietnamese its rhythm. You'll be a tone master in no time! Then, we're cruising through single vowels like pros, adding an extra sprinkle of fun with double vowels, and turning it up to eleven with triple vowels. It's a vowel extravaganza!

But wait, there's more! We're getting cozy with consonants, doubling the consonant vibes for that extra flair. Plus, we're demystifying those sounds you've probably heard but weren't quite sure how to pronounce. Think of it as solving a cool linguistic puzzle!

Now, here's the fun part – after each lesson, we're not hitting the brakes; we're hitting the review button. We want to make sure those tones, vowels, and consonants are sticking in your memory. It's like a quick checkpoint to see how awesome you're becoming!

So, if you've ever tapped your foot to Vietnamese beats and thought, 'I want in on this,' you're in the right place. This course is your backstage pass to speaking Vietnamese like a local. Let's turn every word into a celebration – join the language fiesta!

3. **At the Airport**

   - Students will be able to navigate an Italian airport, understanding signage and basic procedures.

   - Students will learn key phrases for checking in, security, and boarding.


4. **Getting Around**

   - Students will be able to ask for and understand directions in Italian.

   - Students will become familiar with transportation-related vocabulary and phrases.


5. **Asking Directions**

   - Students will be able to ask for and give directions in Italian.

   - Students will understand common phrases and responses used when asking for directions.


6. **At the Hotel**

   - Students will be able to check in and out of a hotel, make reservations, and request services in Italian.

   - Students will become familiar with hotel-related vocabulary.


7. **Making Friends**

   - Students will learn phrases for introducing themselves and making friends in casual Italian conversations.

   - Students will be able to engage in small talk and ask personal questions.


8. **At the Restaurant**

   - Students will be able to order food and drinks, understand a menu, and interact with restaurant staff in Italian.

   - Students will learn vocabulary related to dining and Italian cuisine.


9. **Telling Time**

   - Students will be able to ask for and tell the time in Italian.

   - Students will learn phrases related to time, appointments, and schedules.


10. **Money**

    - Students will be able to discuss prices, make purchases, and understand currency exchanges in Italian.

    - Students will become familiar with numbers and financial transactions.


11. **Shopping**

    - Students will be able to shop for clothes, groceries, and other items in Italian.

    - Students will learn vocabulary related to shopping, sizes, and bargaining.


12. **Staying in Touch**

    - Students will be able to discuss communication methods, such as phone calls and emails, in Italian.

    - Students will learn phrases for maintaining contact with friends and family.


13. **At the Train Station**

    - Students will be able to navigate a train station, buy tickets, and understand schedules in Italian.

    - Students will learn vocabulary related to trains and travel.


14. **Getting Help**

    - Students will be able to ask for and provide assistance in Italian in case of emergencies.

    - Students will learn key phrases for medical and safety situations.


15. **Days and Months**

    - Students will be able to discuss dates, days of the week, and months of the year in Italian.

    - Students will learn how to schedule events and talk about timeframes.


16. **Going Out**

    - Students will be able to plan and discuss leisure activities, such as going to the cinema, theater, or clubs, in Italian.

    - Students will become familiar with vocabulary related to entertainment and socializing.


17. **Asking Questions and Describing Things**

    - Students will be able to ask various types of questions and describe objects, people, and situations in Italian.

    - Students will learn important adjectives, nouns, and sentence structures for detailed conversations.

title: ClearSpeak's English pronunciation for ARABIC accents
description:
What you get

Is your first accent of Arabic origin? This course is designed specifically to target your problem sounds. It’s one of the ClearSpeak Time-Online Series tailored for different accent groups.

  • You get a complete package for both clear pronunciation and fluent neutral British English accent

  • Your tutor is speech pathologist Alison ‘Kimi’ Kimble, an authority in English accent change

  • Take the complete 15 Unit course OR study only a few problem sounds

  • You’ll find around 14 hours of demo videos and loads of audio exercises along with many support articles

The ClearSpeak Method is a leader in the accent change field. It’s easy to get results with the professional speech pathology techniques.

Your voice coach

Hi

I’m Kimi Kimble, your professional tutor and voice coach for your speech journey.

If unclear speech is holding you back in your studies or career, then a Time-Online course is definitely for you. Our courses are for ‘committed’ students who may have tried other approaches and found they don’t produce a true or lasting result. There are no quick fixes!

Pronunciation and accent change are a skill

Like learning to play the piano, you cannot hope to master these by watching a series of short video clips. It takes much more to be able to think and pronounce fluently at the same time.

The professional ClearSpeak Method

Time-Online courses are based on the ClearSpeak Method developed over 25 years. Used in many universities internationally, professional speech therapy techniques set this course apart from others. It will give you your best shot at achieving a superior result.

Use fun techniques to learn

I’ll be guiding you every step of the way through many hours of masterclass videos and ‘listen-and-repeat’ exercises. You’ll be using lots of intuitive visualisations along with instructions about how to move your mouth into the correct position. Simply ‘telling’ you what to do, and asking you to mimic me, are never enough.

Accent change is not just about learning separate sounds

Whole accent change has three quite different aspects and all are essential:

  • FIRST you learn to make each new sound, one at a time.

  • SECOND you change the overall holding posture of your mouth as you speak. All your sounds are placed within this posture.

    This method is used by professional mimics to create a consistent and fluent accent. There is no other way. Your mouth must ‘feel’ it is operating quite differently when you change from one accent to another. Most pronunciation courses make no mention of this critical step.

  • THIRD you tune in to the speech melody of the English speech flow.

    This is quite different to learning about intonation and stress within individual sentences. The Time-Online texts encourage you to mimic the overall rhythmic melody, regardless of the words or sentences used in your speech flow.


So, take a look at the outline that follows to learn more. I’ll be delighted to have your company if you decide to join me.

All the best for now!

Your tutor,

Kimi


“The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step”. LAO TZU


How a course works

The course is by self-study online.

In the Start Up Unit you will:

Discover all about English sounds and the ClearSpeak techniques

Decide on your course Plan

  • The Typical List of Errors for your accent group has the 15 most common consonant and vowel errors relative to English

  • Study the entire List if your aim is overall accent change  OR  Select only a few problem sounds

Then move on to study each sound on your Plan. There is a Sound Kit Unit of study materials for each one.

All 15 Sound Kits have

  • A one-hour Masterclass video or a Tutorial video. Kimi demonstrates how real students achieve success with the ClearSpeak techniques.

  • A Sound Guide giving you instructions on how to make the sound

  • Articles on key issues or challenges in making the sound

  • Up to one hour of custom-designed ‘listen and repeat’ audio exercises supported by text with words, phrases, sentences and story text

  • A set of Advanced Exercises for problem issues, such as confusion between similar sounds

  • A Review Text for evaluating your progress as you learn

  • A completion token for each Sound Kit Unit

title: German prepositions. See, hear and repeat.
description:
See, hear and repeat. Just like a baby learns a language. This revolutionary - yet simple and natural - teaching method works no matter what your native language is. No captions/ subtitles needed! Just three minutes per preposition and you learn to use them.

You learn phrases - not complex theory. Learning phrases mean that you can start talking immediately. When you know the phrases by heart, you don't have to think when you talk. Just like you do not have think grammar when you talk your native language.

What a great way to spend the minutes you have on a bus, coffee break or when waiting a friend to arrive.

Your mind, muscles and ears learn the phrases by seeing, hearing and repeating. This is how a baby learns a language and so can you. Remember to start talking immediately. Speaking is the best (and only) way to learn. It´s not important if you say something wrong. Also babies talk a bit funny when they are learning. They learn along the way when they use the language.

Some preposition take the dative case, some the accusative. And some take either one depending what you are saying. When there is movement involved (where to), you use the accusative case. When the is no movement (where), you use the dative case.

For all levels. No grammar needed. Just see, hear and repeat.
headline: Confused? When to use "die" and when "dem" with the prepositions?

title: The Complete Guide to American English Pronunciation
description:
Is English not your first language? Are people constantly asking you to repeat yourself? Do you want to advance in your career or business, but you feel like your foreign accent is holding you back?

Then this course is for you.

Hi. We hope you choose the complete guide to American English pronunciation. In it, I’ll take you through all 38 important sounds of American English, one at a time, to help you better pronounce each one. Each sound is produced for you to mimic, alone and in sample words, and illustrated with an animated mouth diagram where applicable. Then learn American English spelling rules for each sound. Also learn the International Phonetic Alphabet symbol for each sound.

Then, you further practice the sound next to other similar sounds. For this we use minimal pairs--These are pairs of words that have one sound distinct in them, for example: pin / fin, tanks / thanks, bad / bat. In these lessons, we’ll focus on how to make each word in the pair sound distinct and correct. Each lesson ends in a test to make sure that you can hear the difference between each pair of words. All this to help you to learn to pronounce American English more like a native speaker. Give it a go…

title: Learn Swedish for real-life conversations & daily situations

visible_instructors.title: Alicia Fiedler
visible_instructors.name: Alicia
visible_instructors.job_title: Native Swedish tutor with a long online teaching experience

description:
Ready to take your Swedish beyond textbooks and into everyday life? Learn Swedish for Real-Life Conversations & Daily Situations is a practical, scenario-based course designed to help you confidently navigate common interactions in Swedish—all without a heavy emphasis on grammar. Perfect for learners who want to improve their speaking skills and engage in real conversations within Sweden’s social settings.


Course Structure:

The course is divided into 10 chapters, each focusing on a key real-life scenario:

  • Grannprat – Small talk with neighbors

  • Kafé & restaurang – Ordering at cafés & restaurants

  • Shopping – Clothes shopping and basic transactions

  • I hemmet – Language for home settings

  • Kollektivtrafik & vägbeskrivningar – Taking public transport and asking for directions

  • På hotell – Communicating at a hotel

  • På apoteket – Communicating at the pharmacy

  • Prata med vänner – Casual conversations with friends

  • Fest & högtid – Attending parties and traditional events

  • Boka tid – Booking appointments


Lesson Format:

Each chapter includes 9 concise lessons (1-8 minutes each), designed to build your skills step by step:

  1. Phrases – Learn 5 key phrases for the scenario, with repetition to build fluency.

  2. Common Responses – Understand 5 likely responses to improve listening skills and quick reactions.

  3. Phrases (Part 2) – Learn 5 more key phrases to build confidence.

  4. Common Responses (Part 2) – Expand your listening comprehension with 5 additional responses.

  5. Vocabulary – Learn 9 essential words related to the chapter’s topic.

  6. Dialogue – Listen to a realistic dialogue using the phrases you’ve learned, first with subtitles, then audio-only, to sharpen comprehension. Includes 3 comprehension questions.

  7. Role-Play Practice – Practice responding in varied conversations for natural, flexible interactions.

  8. Exercises – Engage in fun exercises such as fill-in-the-blank, picture activities, and correct responses to reinforce what you’ve learned.

  9. Cultural Insight – Watch a brief video with cultural tips to deepen your understanding of Swedish life and customs.


Interactive Quizzes & Downloadable PDF Files:

Each chapter concludes with an interactive quiz to review key phrases and vocabulary, ensuring you’re ready to use them in real-life situations. You’ll also get a downloadable PDF with all essential phrases and words from the chapter, making it easy to review and practice anytime.


By the end of this course, you’ll have learned 200 useful phrases in Swedish and will be able to have simple conversations, handle everyday situations, and feel more connected to Swedish culture. Whether you’re moving to Sweden, planning a trip, or simply want to improve your language skills, Learn Swedish for Real-Life Conversations & Daily Situations will help you speak confidently in Swedish!

title: Learn Korean with 2 Korean Short Stories for Beginners
description:
This Course in a Nutshell

In this course, you'll learn Korean from the ground up through reading easy and enjoyable Korean story. This isn't your typical boring, rule-based language class. I have provided a straightforward explanation of a Korean sentence by breaking it down into simple parts and giving an English translation.

Moreover, I have clarified the function of each word within the sentence to aid readers in comprehending how they interact with one another. The utilization of Romanization is also beneficial for readers who are unfamiliar with the Korean script.

My explanation helps to convey the tone and nuance of the sentence.

The Korean short story titled "Nature is My Friend," "Flower Friends" are the centerpiece of this course, providing a unique and engaging learning experience. Divided into two sections - lessons and practice - the story is accessible to both absolute beginners and those with prior Korean experience.

My primary objective is to help you achieve fluency in spoken Korean. By engaging with this story and practicing the language through various exercises, I aim to build your confidence and ability to speak Korean naturally and comfortably.

description:
Are you ready to start speaking Moroccan Arabic (Darija) with confidence? This beginner-friendly course, taught entirely in English, is designed to guide you step by step through the essentials of real-life Moroccan communication. We focus on practical language you will actually use, making it simple, clear, and engaging for complete beginners.

You will be introduced to everyday situations where Darija is most needed: taking a taxi, ordering at a café or restaurant, shopping at the market, greeting people, and asking for basic information. Each module includes dialogues, key phrases, and bite-sized vocabulary lists so you can start speaking right away. We pay special attention to numbers and money-related phrases to help you handle prices, bargaining, and payments with ease—because numbers are essential in daily interactions.

Beyond phrases, you’ll learn the most common expressions and vocabulary used across Morocco, including greetings, polite forms, time and days, directions, and simple small talk. Pronunciation tips and cultural notes are included to help you sound natural and understand local habits. Short quizzes reinforce each lesson, and downloadable cheat-sheets make revision quick and effective.

By the end of this course, you will be able to introduce yourself, handle basic transactions, ask simple questions, and navigate common scenarios confidently in Darija. If you are a beginner, this course is for you. If you have any questions at any time, I will be happy to help and answer them. Join now and start your Darija journey today!
