In line with the latest developments in Information Communications Technology (ICT), this course teaches students the language and skills they need to understand and work in the world of computers. The 30 topic-based units cover everything from computer essentials through to programming, web design, job hunting, and future technologies. A focus on terminology is combined with vocabulary and grammar practice to give students the tools to use English in areas such as describing features and functions, applying for jobs and discussing the world of ICT. With the support of clear explanations, no specialist knowledge of ICT is required, making this course ideal for anyone who needs to understand the English of computing for study or work.

Computers are an essential part of everyone's day-to-day lives and are becoming more important all the time. Can you imagine living without a computer, the Internet or your smart phone for even just one day?

It would be almost impossible! We've put together this list of computer vocabulary because these days, English language learners have to know how to talk about computers for both their personal and professional lives. People use computers constantly and even more so than for other fields, English is the dominant language for subjects such as computer science, programming and web design.

In this Course, you will learn all of the vocabulary you need to speak about computers, technology, and the Internet in English.

title: GRAMMAR: Those Tricky English Words
description:
English is a living language. You learn listen to it, you learn to speak it, you write it and you read it. You want to be good at. You want to understand the spoken word and you want others to understand you.

Learning a new language is not easy. Sometimes simple sometimes, sometimes difficult, but not impossible to master. With practice, practice and more practice you will improve your skills.

To  study, to travel, to work and for leisure, knowing how to use English well can broaden your world and open wonderful opportunities. It's known as universal language.

But, English also has some quirks.

There are words that can cause us confusion. It can have the same spelling, but also a different spelling.  It can have the sound the same,  but also a different sound. But it will always used differently and have a different meaning?

It's important to gain the knowledge you need so that you can make sense of it and know the different contexts in which to use it.

I want to introduce you to three of its quirks. You might find it confusing at first. You might also recognise some of these words and have not always used it correctly.

Lets go on a little journey and learn some of these words. It will improve your writing, pronunciation and your vocabulary.
headline: GET YOUR WORDS RIGHT - How to pronounce it. How to spell it. What does it mean?
requirements_data: An intermediate language level is required.
A willingness to learn and delve deeper into the quirkiness of the English language
A willingness to improve your writing

Improve your writing by learning when to use which spelling and meaning

If you'd like to learn what these word pairs are, and the differences between them, this is the course for you.
This course will help you improve your writing by using the correct words to convey your ideas.

title: Bitesized Vietnamese for Travellers

visible_instructors.title: Annie Tran
visible_instructors.name: Annie
visible_instructors.job_title: PhD candiate in Linguistics - The University of Sydney

description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through Vietnam with "Bitesized Vietnamese for Travelers." This dynamic course offers bite-sized lessons designed specifically for adventurous explorers seeking to immerse themselves in Vietnamese culture and language. From mastering essential communication skills for navigating bustling markets and ordering local delicacies to gaining insights into Vietnamese customs and social norms, this course equips you with the tools you need to confidently explore the vibrant landscapes and connect with the warm-hearted locals. With practical exercises, pronunciation practice, and cultural insights, "Bitesized Vietnamese for Travelers" is your essential companion for an enriching and unforgettable travel experience in Vietnam.

In this course, you will be able to achieve the following milestones: 

  1. Mastering Vietnamese Pronunciation: By the end of this course, learners will be able to accurately pronounce Vietnamese vowels, consonants, tones, and combinations, enabling effective communication and comprehension in basic travel situations.

  2. Navigating Common Travel Scenarios: Upon completion of this course, learners will be equipped with essential vocabulary and phrases to confidently engage in various travel scenarios, including airport procedures, hotel interactions, asking for directions, ordering food and drinks, and handling emergencies.

  3. Developing Basic Communication Skills: Through interactive lessons and practical exercises, learners will develop foundational skills in Vietnamese greetings, pronouns, numbers, dates, and time, fostering the ability to initiate and maintain simple conversations with native speakers.

  4. Cultural immersion: This course aims to not only teach language skills but also provide cultural insights and practical tips for navigating Vietnamese social norms, such as shopping and bargaining customs, enhancing travelers' ability to connect with locals and enrich their travel experience.

This course is designed to be your passport to Vietnamese language and culture, whether you're a seasoned traveler or embarking on your first adventure. So, pack your sense of adventure and get ready to dive into the vibrant world of Vietnamese travel language!

title: Conversational Swedish - Swedish now46
description:
About our course:
The purpose of the preparation of this course is to eliminate the shortage of resources in Swedish and to have the participants listen to the Swedish words and sentences exactly from the voice of the Swedish instructor. One of the other objectives of the course is to show and listen to the sentences established according to the Subjek-Verb-Objekt rule, which is the immutable rule of Swedish in making sentences (SVO).

Course content was created with words and sentences containing many different professional groups. Particular attention has been paid to the words and sentences chosen to be words and sentences used in daily life. Prepared committee and audio sentences were prepared in the form of bilateral dialogue or question-answer type and presented to course participants.

While choosing the occupational groups in the course, the content of the course was prepared by taking into account many businesses serving in the tourism sector, as well as health institutions, patient households, marketers, students and many other professional groups. In this course, we also tried to give the information they may need to different topics within the course as much as possible, considering the students who have recently immigrated to Sweden, students who continue their university education in Sweden, or people who have just started to learn Swedish. Participants of the course will be able to find the words given in each unit in alphabetical order. Since the same words have synonym words, they will be able to find the same words written twice in some units, or they will be able to see and hear words that have multiple meanings more than once in the same unit or in a different unit. Additions will be made to the current topics of our course in the future. No extra fee will be charged for the additions to be made.

title: Learn Turkish with Stories ( B1-B2 )
description:
Hello friends - Merhaba arkadaşlar. I am an English and Turkish teacher and also a native Turkish speaker. I have been teaching Turkish to foreigners from different countries for almost 10 years. In the course, I always teach my students the logic behind the grammar rules so they don't need to memorize a large number of grammar rules. With the clues I teach, they remember all the things they have learned much more easily. This technique facilitates learning Turkish for the learners.


The course includes 12 video lessons and 1 downloadable document. After studying a total of 12 video lessons, you will notice a significant improvement in your Turkish level.  The lessons are presented in a simple, clear, comprehensible, and logical way. The example sentences and dialogues in the lessons are formed with the most common and useful Turkish words. Till now, thousands of students have learned Turkish by studying these video lessons online. It is a great opportunity for everyone around the world who wants to start learning Turkish from zero.


By taking this course, you will:

  • Practice B1-B2 grammar subjects comprehensively.

  • Learn hundreds of useful words.

  • Learn how to translate from Turkish to English and also from English to Turkish.

  • Improve your level of Turkish.

title: Spanish Basics 2025 A1 Level 3: Learn Beginner Spanish
description:
Welcome to Spanish Basics 2025 A1 Level 3: Learn Beginner Spanish! This course is a more focused and concise version of the Complete Spanish Language Course 2025, offering a detailed look at specific topics that will help you expand your Spanish vocabulary and grammar in a structured way.


In this course, you will learn Spanish words and phrases related to hobbies and leisure activities, allowing you to talk about your interests and daily routines in everyday conversations. You’ll also dive into health-related vocabulary, covering body parts and common phrases for describing physical conditions or health issues. In addition, you will master the conjugation of regular verbs in the present tense, one of the essential building blocks of the Spanish language. Regular verbs form the backbone of most sentences in Spanish, and understanding how to conjugate them will significantly improve your speaking and writing skills.


This shorter course is designed for those who want to learn Spanish at a steady pace without committing to a longer, more comprehensive course. By focusing on specific themes, you can easily absorb the material and apply it in practical situations. Whether you’re learning for travel, work, or personal interest, this course will help you build confidence in your Spanish skills, step by step.

title: Basic Russian - 25 lessons for beginners
description:
Would you like to learn the Russian language from scratch? This is a quick starter for learning Russian. Here you'll find only the essential information you need to get started. The Russian language, with its Cyrillic alphabet, grammatical cases, and verb conjugations, can be challenging to master. That's why I offer this efficient course, tested on numerous foreigners. I have been working as a Russian teacher for 7 years now and I know the problems and fears of the students from all over the world.

In this course, you'll focus on spoken Russian, learning everyday topics like introductions, family discussions, daily routines, food, and shopping. You'll master verb tenses for the present, past, and future. Interactive exercises will solidify your learning, while additional resources like 100 most-used phrases and words will boost your confidence.

The key to mastering Russian is consistent revision. This course incorporates this by revisiting previous lessons while introducing new information. So, if you're overwhelmed by complex grammar or unnecessary vocabulary, this course offers a streamlined approach. Don't hesitate to contact me if you need some extra explanation of the material.

Start speaking Russian today! I am sure you'll find value in this course. Hope, you'll like it.

title: French conversation in context A2-B1+
description:
Hi!

We are very happy to see you here!

We decided to create this course for anyone who wants to improve their conversation skills in intermediate French. You will learn hundreds of words and expressions that will prepare you for your stay in France.

We divided the course in 16 sessions - each one of them carefully chosen, to cover majority of the most important aspects of life in France. You will learn how to order in a restaurant, rent a car, shop for clothes and shoes, rent a flat and many more.

The course is full of cultural knowledge - you won´t just learn vocabulary, you will learn about many aspects of life in France.

We did our best to make the course as progressive as possible. The first session is a warm-up and contains the easiest vocabulary. It gets more and more difficult with each video. The last session contains the most difficult vocabulary, so we encourage you to watch the videos from first to last.

We believe that you learn best when you learn in your target language. The audio is 100% in French, but there are subtitles in English. This is a great way to improve your listening skills.

Allez, on commence ?

title: I learn Farsi
description: In this course, you will learn step-by-step conversational skills in Persian. First, you will become familiar with vocabulary related to popular topics that you need to discuss. Then, you will be able to apply this vocabulary in simple and basic sentences. The slides are accompanied by pictures that help you learn easily. After each slide, there is a corresponding slide for self-assessment. My primary goal in this course is to enable you to converse in practical situations. Later, we will focus on recognizing the sounds in Persian, as there are some sounds that many languages do not have. This part of the lesson will help students pronounce and distinguish each sound correctly. Finally, you will become familiar with all consonants and vowels in writing and reading, one by one. Each letter is accompanied by slides designed to provide you with more examples. The grammar section is another component of the course, which will teach you very basic grammar in Persian. It will demonstrate the differences between English and Persian in all parts of sentences. At the end of each section, there are assessments in the resources to help you evaluate your understanding. In addition, there are links to related lessons to provide you with more opportunities to enhance your learning.

title: Vietnamese Vocabulary Class for Your Child (Part 1)

visible_instructors.title: Ngoc Skros
visible_instructors.name: Ngoc
visible_instructors.job_title: Succeed with a Professional and World-Class Education

description:
Why purchases this class for your child?

This class provides your child with common Vietnamese words, which can be used in daily conversations. Each topic includes 10 Vietnamese words. Your child will have a lot of opportunities to work on his/her pronunciation during class. Furthermore, your child will learn simple sentences in 1-2 lessons in each part of the Vietnamese vocabulary class.


What will be taught in this class?

Here are the topics that will be covered in the first part of this Vietnamese vocabulary class.

Topic 1: Feelings

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding feelings/emotions. In this lesson, your child will also learn how to answer the question "How are you?" in Vietnamese.


Topic 2: Weather

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding weather. In this lesson, your child will practice the vocabulary through activities and pictures.


Topic 3: Colors

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding colors. In this lesson, your child will practice the vocabulary by identifying the colors of different objects.


Topic 4: Animals

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding animals, including domestic and wild animals. In this lesson, your child will practice the vocabulary by choosing the right Vietnamese words for animals that they see.


Topic 5: Furniture

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding furniture. In this lesson, your child will sort furniture in appropriate rooms.


Topic 6: House

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding their houses, such as rooms, roof, and so on. your child will practice the vocabulary through class activities.


Topic 7: Food

- Your child will learn 10 Vietnamese words regarding food. In this lesson, your child will also have an opportunity to learn at least 2 simple sentences to express his/her preference.


What are the requirements to take this class?

  • At least five years old with parental guidance

  • Writing (optional)

  • Knowledge of Vietnamese (optional)

title: Brazilian Portuguese Let's Speak V1 - Beginner Level
description:
Hello How are you? My name is Maycon, I am Brazilian and I am a Portuguese teacher. I have prepared this course for you who need to travel to Brazil but have never studied Portuguese or have only studied a little but you do not have the necessary knowledge to speak and understand Portuguese.

Most students that come to me to learn Portuguese, need to be able to have normal conversations in Portuguese in a short period of time. Because of this, we will see in this content the main subjects to talk Portuguese to Brazilians.


You'll see a very well structured course, with many videos, explanations, visual contents, flash cards, and a complete website to keep studying Portuguese.


You'll learn Portuguese from the beginning to the advanced level with this course, and obviously you need to access our Portuguese Learning platform to keep practicing and repeating every day. And don't forget to take some private classes by contacting me. I'm available to help you.

Learning Portuguese can be a valuable asset for students, for several reasons. Firstly, Portuguese is the sixth most spoken language in the world, with over 250 million speakers worldwide. By learning Portuguese, students can open doors to communicate with people from Portugal, Brazil, Angola, Mozambique, and other Portuguese-speaking countries, creating a new world of opportunities for personal and professional growth.

In addition, learning Portuguese can provide students with a better understanding of the culture and history of Portuguese-speaking countries. Portuguese is a language with a rich literary and cultural heritage, and students who learn Portuguese can access a wealth of literature, music, and art from these countries.

title: Take the Mystery Out of Learning Spanish
description:
If you’re a beginner at learning Spanish or beginning to brush up on your Spanish skills, this course will teach you things about Spanish that will help make sense out of what you’re studying so you can learn more easily, and quicker! And the great thing is you don’t need any previous experience to take this course.

WHAT WILL YOU LEARN?

From my experience and training in Spanish, I’ve seen that the more someone understands why words change from one context to another, the more engaged the students are and the quicker they’re able to learn because they can understand the patterns that make up the language. That’s why I wanted to share what I’ve learned with you. I’ve picked some of the basic concepts in Spanish that help the most in acquisition and retention of a foreign language when you’re first learning.

Some of the things you’ll learn in this course are:

  1. Punctuation and how it cues you when reading

  2. Cognates and how they can make learning Spanish easier

  3. Diminutives and why they’re used

  4. Pronunciation and how to sound more like a native speaker

  5. Adjectives and how their placement is helpful

  6. Number, which is singular and plural, and why it’s important

  7. Gender, which is masculine and feminine, and what the subtleties tell you

If you want to go even further with learning how to sound more like a native speaker, you can download the activity titled, "Practice With Phonetic Spellings in Spanish" that's in lecture 5 on pronunciation. This activity, with the downloadable resource of the Pronunciation Guide that you can also find in that lecture, will help you pronounce Spanish with more confidence, while avoiding the most obvious pronunciation errors.

IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?

If you want to have a leg up on learning Spanish, yes! By the end of this course you should have a greater understanding of some critical and foundational aspects of the Spanish language that will make it easier to learn.

LET'S GET STARTED!

I hope to hear about what new concepts you've enjoyed learning about, and getting any questions or feedback you have!
headline: Understanding the WHY Behind the Language So You Can Learn Quicker and More Easily

This ESL Business English course is specially designed for non-native English speakers who want to excel in report writing. Whether you're preparing for exams like TOEIC, IELTS, or TOEFL—or simply need to improve your business communication—this course is your path to success.

Confidence in writing: Say goodbye to the stress of writing reports. You'll learn step-by-step techniques that make the process simple and manageable. 

Professional impact: A well-written report showcases your intelligence, logical thinking, and ability to organize ideas effectively. It helps you stand out as a reliable and competent professional.

Hello friends - Merhaba arkadaşlar. I am an English and Turkish teacher and also a native Turkish speaker. I have been teaching Turkish to foreigners from different countries for almost 10 years. title: Learn Technical English Vocabulary 2024
description:
This course is designed for A2/B1 CEFR-level English learners who are either starting or building a career in technical fields such as engineering, IT, manufacturing, or maintenance. It is ideal for individuals who need to improve their technical English to communicate effectively in their workplace, whether it’s understanding technical instructions, reading manuals, or writing basic reports. The course is also beneficial for vocational students, apprentices, or professionals transitioning into English-speaking technical environments who need to build their vocabulary and confidence in technical communication.

By the end of this course, learners will be able to:

  1. Understand and Use Common Technical Terms: Demonstrate familiarity with 400 key technical English words and phrases commonly used in industries such as engineering, manufacturing, and IT, and apply them accurately in both spoken and written contexts.

  2. Interpret and Follow Technical Instructions: Read and understand technical instructions, diagrams, and manuals, enabling effective navigation of tools, equipment, and processes in technical environments.

  3. Communicate Clearly in Technical Settings: Express ideas, procedures, and technical issues confidently in English, using appropriate vocabulary when discussing tools, materials, processes, and operations in a technical workplace.

  4. Prepare and Review Basic Technical Documentation: Create, review, and understand simple technical reports, manuals, and documentation, improving overall communication skills for technical work environments.

title: Korean Level 1; The Ultimate Catalytic Course
description:
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."


Many Korean language courses focus too much on getting results fast but ignore the importance of getting the fundamentals right. They use too many English-centric tricks to help students remember Korean concepts, which can seriously mess up the students' fundamental understanding of the subject.


That's why this course was created to help beginner Korean learners get a strong foundation in Korean and subsequently, prime them for their future learning journey.


This course is for students who:
- are beginner learners of the Korean language
- already know how to read 한글


This course is also the perfect next step after students have finished learning 한글.


Through this course, students will learn ESSENTIAL grammar skills, new vocabulary words and along the way, tips and tricks to help them progress in their learning. No hippie-style teaching; only genuine and professional Korean education.


By the end of this course, students should be confident enough to even carry on learning on their own! Students will be given resources and advice on how to continue their learning journey.


This may be THE ONE Korean course that will catalyze your Korean learning progress.

title: Spanish Basics 2025 A1 Level 4: Learn Beginner Spanish
description:
Welcome to Spanish Basics 2025 A1 Level 4: Learn Beginner Spanish! This course is part of a series of condensed Spanish courses that break down the language into manageable sections, making it easier for beginners to absorb specific grammar and vocabulary topics. By focusing on essential concepts, this shorter course will help you improve your Spanish without the time commitment of a longer course.


In this course, you’ll master the difference between "Ser" and "Estar," two of the most important verbs in Spanish. Knowing when to use these verbs is crucial for accurately describing identities, states, emotions, and locations. You’ll also learn how to use reflexive verbs, which are common in everyday Spanish for talking about daily routines, personal care, and actions that refer back to the speaker. Furthermore, this course will introduce you to job-related vocabulary, enabling you to talk about professions and describe work situations in Spanish.


By the end of this course, you’ll be able to confidently use these essential grammar points and vocabulary in practical conversations. The shorter format allows you to focus on mastering these key concepts without feeling overwhelmed, making it easier to progress toward fluency.


Hope you have fun learning Spanish A1 and don't forget to check out my other courses.

title: German for Beginners – A1.1 Full Course
description:
A1.1 German Course – Perfect for Beginners!

If you're new to German, this course is the perfect place to start! You’ll begin with the basics—learning the German alphabet, pronunciation, and simple greetings so you can introduce yourself and have basic conversations with confidence.

We’ll cover essential grammar like personal pronouns, present tense verb conjugations, and the correct use of "nicht" and "kein" for negation. You’ll also learn how to use articles (der, die, das, ein, eine) correctly.

Your vocabulary will grow as you learn words for everyday objects, family members, food, adjectives, and places. Through practical exercises, you’ll start forming sentences, asking and answering questions, and using prepositions of place to describe locations accurately.

In the speaking and listening sections, you’ll engage in real-life dialogues like introducing yourself, ordering food, asking for directions, and making appointments. With slow and clear conversations, you’ll improve pronunciation and listening skills step by step.

We’ll also dive into German culture, traditions, and holidays to help you understand daily life in Germany and other German-speaking countries.

By the end of this course, you'll be able to read short texts, write simple emails, and communicate effectively in everyday situations. You will gain the confidence needed to start speaking German fluently. Start your German learning journey today

title: Essential Chinese Grammar - HSK 1
description:
This course is specifically designed for individuals who are preparing to take the HSK1 exam. It is ideal for those who have already studied Chinese for around 30 to 50 hours or have mastered approximately 150 Chinese words (not characters). The course covers all the essential grammar points that you will need to know for the HSK1 exam, providing you with a solid foundation in Chinese grammar. With each video ranging from 5 to 15 minutes in length, you can easily fit one video into your daily routine, such as during a coffee break or between other tasks.

The course is taught entirely in Chinese, with English subtitles provided to support your understanding. We believe that maximizing your exposure to the Chinese language is key to effective learning. By immersing yourself in Chinese, you’ll not only become familiar with the vocabulary but also develop a better ear for the rhythm and structure of the language. The instructors speak at an appropriate speed, making it easy for you to follow along and absorb the material.

Whether you are just starting to learn Chinese or looking to solidify your skills in preparation for the HSK1 exam, this course is designed to help you succeed. With clear explanations and practical examples, you will be well-equipped to understand and use the grammar points in real-life situations. We hope that this course will help you confidently reach your language learning goals and pass the HSK1 exam with ease.

title: Get your toddler to talk using SLP designed cartoons
description:
The goal is get your toddler to talk! This course is designed by a speech pathologist, and it is for toddlers that have fewer than 15 words in their vocabulary. The toddler is encouraged to watch 35, three-minute videos, by themselves or together with their parent/caregiver (they can assist by imitating actions and the target word after the characters.)

These cartoons were used in therapy with toddlers that have limited vocabularies and after hundreds of success stories, these cartoons are now available for every child in need!

The course is subdivided into sections based on word categories (vehicles, animals, familiar toddler words, etc). The cartoons do not have to be watched in any particular order. The child can watch each cartoon as many times as they would like in order to master the new word. New words are learned when the child develops the association between the word and what it represents. A specific technique of having the word repeated many times during the cartoon is used in order to enhance the child's understanding of the word. The same family of characters is used throughout all of the 35 cartoons to promote the child's connection with the characters.

It is beneficial for the parent to imitate the actions after the cartoon characters and to sing the target word as it comes up on the screen. This will help elicit word productions from your child. However, the parent/caregiver does not need to be present in order for the child to learn!

title: Master Japanese with 800 Real-Life Dialogues
description:
Welcome to "Master Japanese with 800 Real-Life Dialogues", a comprehensive and immersive Japanese language course designed for learners of all levels. Whether you're a complete beginner or someone looking to deepen your conversational skills, this course offers a unique, engaging, and affordable way to become fluent in Japanese through 800 high-quality audio dialogues. Each dialogue has been crafted and voiced by advanced artificial intelligence to provide the most natural and modern spoken Japanese available today.

A New Standard in Language Learning

This course redefines how Japanese is taught by focusing on realistic, natural conversation. Instead of static textbook examples or overly simplified sentences, you will learn from dynamic dialogues that reflect real situations, tones, and rhythms of everyday Japanese. Each conversation is supported by full transcriptions and real-time English translations to guide your comprehension and vocabulary acquisition.

What sets this course apart is its smart use of AI technology: all dialogues are voiced by next-generation AI speakers that mimic native Japanese pronunciation with astonishing realism. The result? You get the closest experience possible to listening to native speakers, making your ear more attuned to natural pronunciation, intonation, and speech patterns.

How Each Lesson Works

Every video lesson in this course follows a two-step format to maximize learning and retention:

  1. Natural Playback – First, the full dialogue is played once without interruptions. This is your chance to listen, absorb, and understand the rhythm and flow of natural Japanese speech in context.

  2. Listen and Repeat Mode – The same dialogue is played again, this time with short pauses after each sentence or phrase. This mode allows you to mimic native pronunciation, intonation, and pacing. It's an essential technique to internalize not just words, but how those words are spoken naturally.

This dual-phase approach ensures that you not only understand Japanese but can actively speak and pronounce it confidently.

Real-Time Translation and Transcriptions

To support learners at all levels, every dialogue includes:

  • A real-time English translation of each sentence displayed as you listen

  • A complete transcript of the Japanese dialogue

  • A downloadable PDF file that contains the full script and English translation for offline review and practice

These materials empower you to study anywhere, anytime — whether online or offline. You can read while you listen, repeat phrases for pronunciation practice, or review the dialogues as written texts to deepen your understanding of grammar, vocabulary, and usage.

Who Is This Course For?

This course is ideal for:

  • Beginners looking for a structured yet immersive way to start speaking Japanese

  • Intermediate learners who want to improve fluency and comprehension through exposure to native-speed dialogues

  • Advanced students seeking to maintain and refine their language skills through natural speech patterns

  • Travelers or professionals preparing for real-life conversations in Japan

  • Anime and Japanese culture enthusiasts who want to connect more deeply with the language

No matter your goal, this course provides the tools and content necessary to become confident in your ability to understand and speak Japanese.

Immersive and Practical Content

With 800 different dialogues covering a wide range of real-life topics, you’ll encounter language used in everyday scenarios such as:

  • Greetings and small talk

  • Shopping and restaurants

  • Public transport and directions

  • Work and school situations

  • Weather and seasons

  • Visiting doctors or pharmacies

  • Social events and hobbies

  • Expressing opinions and feelings

Each scenario is carefully crafted to reflect real cultural and linguistic nuances so that you are not only learning Japanese but also learning how Japanese people communicate.

Lifetime Access and One-Time Payment

At Lingo Training, we believe language education should be accessible. That’s why this entire course is offered with a one-time payment — no subscriptions, no hidden fees, no time limits.

Once enrolled, you receive lifetime access to all course content, including:

  • All 800 video lessons

  • All real-time English translations

  • All downloadable PDFs

  • Any future updates or improvements to the course

Learn at your own pace, come back to lessons whenever you like, and build fluency step by step with no pressure or expiration date.

Technologically Advanced, Human-Centered

The AI-generated voices used in this course are among the most advanced and realistic on the market. Unlike robotic or unnatural-sounding text-to-speech systems, these voices are smooth, expressive, and modeled after native Japanese speakers. This makes your learning experience not just more enjoyable, but far more effective.

Every element of this course is carefully designed with human learners in mind — from the pacing of dialogue to the clarity of visual subtitles and the structured listen-and-repeat format. This ensures a seamless balance between technological innovation and pedagogical excellence.

Downloadable Resources for Deep Learning

Every lesson comes with a downloadable PDF that includes:

  • The full Japanese script

  • The English translation

  • Space for notes or personal translation practice

  • QR codes or links (when applicable) to additional resources

These materials are perfect for offline study, revision, or even printing out to build your own language notebook. They also make it easier to return to challenging lessons or target specific areas of interest.

No Prior Knowledge Needed

You don’t need to know a single word of Japanese to get started. The structure of the course naturally introduces and reinforces vocabulary, sentence structure, and pronunciation, making it ideal for self-study. As you progress through the dialogues, you’ll start to recognize recurring patterns, words, and expressions — which will solidify your understanding without the need for memorization drills or flashcards.

A Journey Worth Taking

Learning a new language opens doors — to new cultures, people, opportunities, and ways of thinking. Japanese, in particular, offers access to one of the world’s richest cultural traditions, modern innovations, and artistic expressions.

With this course, you are not just memorizing words — you are internalizing a language. You are learning to think and communicate in Japanese through natural, realistic, and engaging conversations. And with 800 carefully crafted dialogues, you’ll have more than enough input to take your fluency to the next level.

Enroll today and start your journey with the Lingo Training Japanese Dialogue Course — a smart, immersive, and affordable path to fluency.

title: Chinese Characters You Must Know for HSK 1-2 Volume 3

visible_instructors.title: David Yao
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: founder of Educational Video Courses Online & LEGOO Mandarin

description:
New updates in Version 2020:

- All Chinese Characters and its related vocabulary expansion will be edited into PDF book, share in Udemy courses and sell in Amazon KDP, Google books and iBooks. We find the best way to publish online. See our new course: Sell Books in Amazon, Google Play Books, Apple Books as Pro- How to publish your books on the 3 big marketplaces and Marketing Strategies beyond it using social media etc. ..


Chinese is a pictorial language and is the only Language which has no Alphabet. Chinese Characters originated from picture. According legend, Cang Jie (仓颉) created Chinese Characters or scripts.  Inspired by the trace of bird and animal, he created Chinese Characters or scripts by observing the nature shape such as Sun, moon, wood.  Around one third of the total population on the earth are still using Chinese Characters. The creation and evolution of Chinese Characters is closely interwoven with the development of Chinese Culture and has long lasting impact on Japan, Korean, Vietnam, and Thailand... etc.

Chinese Characters are an important tool for extending, spreading and exchanging idea. Chinese Characters contain information and will never be replaced by Alphabet in other languages.

It is a daunting challenge to foreigner as well as native Chinese. But good news for you, we have secrets to share with you how to study Chinese in a smarter way: 

Guessing!   Guessing by Chinese Radicals. There are around 220 Chinese Radicals in my collections. But the Most Common 20 Chinese Radicals which account 51% of total Chinese Characters.

 We will arrange the Chinese Radicals according their importance and give you the most important 60 Chinese Radicals in 3 courses.

Overall, there will be two series to cover Chinese Radicals and boost your vocabulary.

1 HSK Reading Skills-Guess by Chinese Radicals, Quick View

2 HSK Reading Skills-Guess by Chinese Radicals in Details

Quick View of Chinese Radicals will give you a big picture of Chinese Characters, something like a key to open the treasure.

HSK Reading Skills-Guess by Chinese Radicals in details

We will explain Chinese Radicals with the most common Chinese Characters in HSK 1 - 6 (Chinese Proficiency Test Level 1-6).

After boot camping of Chinese Characters, we will test your understanding by reading quiz.

In each video, there is a section call "Vocabulary Builder", which is our many years’ effort in Chinese teaching as a secondary language.

The main features of "Vocabulary Builder" are:

1 The best possible English translations. The English translation is referring to Oxford Dictionary and other online dictionaries. Clear English translation is SO important for foreigner students to learn Chinese.

Each Character and even phrases may have many meanings. Accurate English translation will give you a crystal clear view on Chinese phrases.

2 Up-to-date and updating. We have go thought the whole Oxford Dictionary and other recourses to collect more than 60,000 phrases with the best translation possible for our reference in editing materials.

We are updating more than 5000 new phrases into our collections to reflect the ever-never fast changing China.

3 Indicating the difficulty level of Phrase according to HSK levels.

You will not see such Classifications in any other dictionaries. Our unique classification provides a framework for selecting of articles. Choosing material suitable for students’ level and evaluate their progress is an Art of teaching.

4 The most important thing is the Vocabulary Builder.

This is more than just a vocabulary list. It is a Language Builder based on the Chinese language’s special features and our 25 years' experience.

The Vocabulary Builder will find and list out the connections among Chinese Characters, expand into more phrases. We will use sentence to show how to use the new phrase in context, to point out the common booby trap.

Vocabulary Builder actually is our natural process of Language Building.

description:
Have you ever considered learning Akan Twi? Akan Twi, the most widely spoken language in Ghana, offers you the opportunity to explore this fascinating world. But what distinguishes Akan Twi from the wide range of languages you could pick to learn?

Akan Twi is spoken by millions of people in Ghana and other parts of West Africa, making it a valuable asset for anyone looking to connect with Akan-speaking communities, whether for travel, business, or personal relationships. Beyond its practical applications, learning Akan Twi offers a window into the rich cultural heritage of the Akan people, including their music, dance, folklore, and more. By learning Akan Twi, you're not just learning a language; you're immersing yourself in a vibrant and diverse cultural tapestry.

In this course, you will start from the basics and gradually progress to more advanced topics. Each module is carefully designed to cover essential aspects of Akan Twi grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and cultural context, ensuring that you develop a well-rounded understanding of the language.


During this course, you will learn:


  • Lots and lots of vocabulary

  • Useful everyday phrases

  • Basic sentence structures

  • Basic grammar rules most beginner courses don’t teach

  • How to pronounce Akan Twi correctly


After taking this course you will be able to:


  • Greet people and introduce yourself both formally and casually

  • Pronounce words correctly without hearing them first

  • Order food

  • Structure basic sentences with ease

  • Describe yourself and other people in both personality and appearance

  • Tell the time and date

  • Make requests, describe what you want and what you plan to do

  • Express your feelings, interests and dislikes

  • Navigate multiple types of everyday situations, like shopping, sports, and the weather

  • Give and receive directions to places you need to go to

  • Make conversations

This course aims to help you master the basics of Akan Twi and give you a strong base onto which you will be able to build your skills as an Akan Twi speaker.

Start your Akan Twi journey with us today!

You would like to master French but its pronunciation feels like a riddle to you?

Indeed, but I may have just the solution. The Melody of French is a 100% online course

title: German Cases Explained in Plain English: Nominative, Accusat

visible_instructors.title: Miss Esther
visible_instructors.name: Miss
visible_instructors.job_title: Your German Guide in Plain English

description:
If you’ve ever felt lost trying to understand German cases, you’re not alone.
Most courses throw endless tables at you and tell you to “just memorize them.” Not here.

In this course, Miss Esther, a native German teacher with over two decades of experience, explains Nominative, Accusative, Dative, and Genitive in plain English — so you finally understand why German words change, not just how.

You’ll learn what each case actually does in a sentence, how to spot it instantly, and how to choose the right one every time. We’ll build step-by-step, connecting grammar to real meaning with examples, charts, and simple logic designed specifically for English speakers.

By the end of this course, you’ll:
- Understand what “case” means in German and why it matters
- Know when to use Nominative, Accusative, Dative, or Genitive — without guessing
- Use articles, adjectives, and prepositions correctly
- Read and build real sentences that sound natural and make sense

This course is perfect for beginners and English speakers who:

  • Struggle with full-immersion classes

  • Want clear, logical explanations (not grammar jargon)

  • Are preparing for a Goethe exam or brushing up on fundamentals

  • Or simply want to speak and write German confidently

You don’t need any prior German knowledge — just curiosity and the willingness to learn through understanding, not memorization.

Let’s make German make sense — together.

A notebook or document for taking a few notes is helpful but not necessary.  Curiosity and patience — this course is designed for adult learners who like logical explanations and real examples, not rote drills.

title: Japanese language course: MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM LEVEL 4

visible_instructors.title: Mikiko Iwasaki
visible_instructors.name: Mikiko
visible_instructors.job_title: Japanese language education & teacher training　日本語教育

description:
This is the last of four levels of the MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM, the most suitable course for those who have finished MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM LEVEL 3.

The main purpose of this course is to let students learn the new concept “APS” based on 「DICTIONARY FORM」, 「てFORM」and 「ないFORM」. Therefore, all the previous courses are the preparation for this course.

Even if you are new to MISJ, if you are familiar with those forms, this is the right course.

You also learn how to choose and use three types of spoken expressions: FORMAL, POLITE, and COLLOQUIAL. It is essential knowledge you have to master if you want to work for Japanese companies or work with Japanese people in the future.

You can download the review materials such as review sheets, lists of patterns & extra vocabulary, one reading material, and the audio material corresponding to the reading material at the end of each lesson.

Suppose you are not confident in particle usage, making Japanese sentences, and handling them in conversations. In that case, I recommend starting your brush-up study with the MISJ WELCOME PROGRAM SECTION 2.

Suppose you are not confident in making and using 「てFORM」 based expressions, I recommend starting your brush-up study with the MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM LEVEL 2.

Suppose you are not confident in making and using 「ないFORM」 based expressions, I recommend starting your brush-up study with the MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM LEVEL 3.
headline: Learn the essential concept named "APS." It will make you a little more accessible to natural conversations.
requirements_data: ・Basic Japanese language listening ability. Although critical explanations are given in English, lessons go on mainly in Japanese, which is supposed to be understandable for those who have finished learning up to MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM LEVEL 3.
・Can read basic Japanese characters, at least ひらがな,カタカナto read review materials provided after each lesson.
・Familiar with 「DICTIONARY FORM」, 「ますFORM」,  「てFORM」and 「ないFORM」.
・English reading ability. Review materials, except for reading materials,  are written in English.
・「漢字（かんじ）」reading ability is not essential.

・MISJ is a unique learning method. And it is designed to learn everything systematically. So, when you study for the first time, it is highly recommended to watch the videos in order, without jumping around to random topics.
what_you_will_learn_data: Finish the NOVICE PROGRAM and prepare for the intermediate-level lessons.
The new concept APS (Applicable Sets) includes four types of APS: VERB APS, イADJECTIVE APS, ナADJECTIVE APS, and NOUN APS.
Various expressions based on APS such as "～, so I guess," "～. so I think," and "～, so I heard or so it was written."
Learn various expressions based on APS, such as "Why & Because" conversation and another way of POLITE expressions, which implies speakers' feelings.
Brief introduction of COLLOQUIAL expression and another way to write sentences, both also based on APS.
How to talk with ELDERs, SUPERIORs, or OUTSIDERs: HONORIFIC and HUMBLE expressions.
Learn about 30 new 漢字（かんじ）and new ways of reading already learned 漢字.

Willing to achieve or improve creative speech and writing ability or fluency in speech.
Willing to study the grammar necessary to pass JLPT N5 and N4 efficiently and effectively. To focus on passing exams, skip the practicing parts and read the review materials.

title: Express Course to learn the Russian Cases (падежи)
description:
Hello everynone! My name is Angelika, a native Russian speaker and language teacher. I have been working in the field of online Russian lessons and training for the past 3 years. I have helped hundreds of people, from young children to mature adults, to achieve their language goals through my online lessons.

As an instructor, I make a point of always challenging my students while being a patient individual and a good listener. It is important for students to feel comfortable and have realistic and achievable goals, and I am doing my best to keep you on track with your language learning objectives.

The Russian language has six cases to show what function a noun has in a sentence: nominative, genitive, dative, accusative, instrumental, and prepositional.

The endings of Russian words change depending on the case they are in. It is best to learn the words and the way they sound in different cases by heart. Learning the cases is the fastest way to sound more fluent in Russian.

Each Russian case has its own purpose and answers a particular set of questions. One of the reasons that cases are so important in the Russian language is the flexibility of the Russian sentence word order. As sentences can be put together in so many ways, cases help distinguish the sentence's subject from its object.

This is a self-study course prepared by e-russkiy. e-russkiy self-study course is a flexible, low-cost way of learning Russian online in your own time, at your own speed. Improve your language level and professional communication skills. Express yourself with confidence with my online, self-study Russian courses.

And also if you want you can book completely personalised online lessons, tailored specifically to your own needs from native russian professional teacher.

This course requires basic knowledge of Russian. If this is not your case, i recommend you my Complete Russian Course for Beginners (A1-A2)

Let's learn to speak Russian in an efficient way.

title: LaTeX Tutorials: A Comprehensive Series
description:
LaTeX, a versatile and robust typesetting language, empowers users to create a diverse range of documents with precision and sophistication. This comprehensive description delves into LaTeX's myriad capabilities, making it the preferred choice for academics, professionals, researchers, and document enthusiasts.

In academia, LaTeX excels in crafting scholarly papers and theses, setting a high standard for research presentation. Its customizable reference styles streamline citations and bibliographies, ensuring the acknowledgment of scholarly work.

In the corporate world, LaTeX shines in crafting impressive Curriculum Vitae (CV) and engaging presentations, enhancing one's professional profile. Its exceptional labeling feature simplifies document navigation and the creation of lists, facilitating complex document organization.

LaTeX's powerful text formatting capabilities offer precise control over fonts and styles, elevating document aesthetics. Beyond text, LaTeX is an invaluable asset for mathematical notation and scientific representation, handling chemical equations, figures, tables, matrices, sums, integrals, fractions, special characters, Greek letters, and more.

This versatile tool allows users to fine-tune document layout and spacing, making it adaptable to various styles and requirements. Its step-by-step guidelines for installation ensure accessibility for newcomers.

In essence, LaTeX is the ultimate document preparation tool, offering unparalleled versatility and precision, making it an ideal choice for well-formatted, professional documents across a wide range of disciplines. Whether it's academic research, corporate presentations, or complex mathematical notations, LaTeX is the trusted partner for document creators worldwide.

title: Read with Confidence: Short Vowels, CVC Blends & Digraphs
description:
Struggling to teach phonics? Watch your child’s confidence soar as they decode words effortlessly—no more tears, frustration, or guessing games!

This isn’t just another phonics course—it’s a proven, stress-free system used by 500+ parents and teachers to transform beginners into confident readers in weeks. Based on Orton-Gillingham principles (the gold standard for dyslexia-friendly instruction), my method turns abstract letter sounds into tangible, memorable skills—even if your child has ADHD, dyslexia, or just "hates reading."

Why 97% of beginners FAIL at phonics (and how to fix it):
Most courses drown kids in abstract rules. My secret? I replace confusion with kinesthetic learning—using hand motions, color-coded charts, and real-world word games that make short vowels stick. In Module 1, you’ll master the #1 mistake parents make (it’s NOT about memorizing letters!). By Module 3, your child will blend consonants/digraphs like sh, ch, and th into words like ship, chip, and thin—without flashcards or drills.


Here’s EXACTLY what you’ll gain:
The "Vowel Anchor" Technique: Stop vowel confusion cold! Teach short vowels with foolproof hand signals (e.g., “/a/ is an alligator chomp!”) so kids never mix up a/e/i/o/u.
Digraph Decoding Kit: Solve the sh/ch/th/wh puzzle with animated story cards (included!) that turn tricky sounds into memorable adventures.
30-Second Blending Drills: My “Sound Sandwich” method builds fluency fast—ideal for short attention spans. (Teachers: Use these in morning warm-ups!)
Printable Progress Tracker: Celebrate wins with a reward system that motivates reluctant readers. Includes dyslexia-friendly fonts!

This course is PERFECT if you:

  • Are a parent of a K-2 child drowning in “sight word lists” but still guessing at cat vs. cot.

  • Are a new teacher overwhelmed by phonics curricula that leave kids behind.

  • Have tried YouTube videos but need structured, bite-sized lessons (5-15 mins/day!) with zero prep.

  • Worry your child has dyslexia—my multisensory approach is clinically backed for neurodiverse learners.

Why I’m NOT like other instructors:
As a certified reading specialist with 12 years in Title 1 schools, I’ve seen every phonics gap. I don’t just teach what to do—I show you why it works (and what to fix when it doesn’t).


BONUS: Lifetime access + 30-day money-back guarantee!
Enroll now and unlock reading success in 30 days or less. Your child’s “aha!” moment is waiting.

title: Learn To Read JLPT N2 Level Kanji Fast And Easy
description:
Are you beginner to intermediate level Japanese language learner?


Have you mastered hiragana and katakana and you're ready to take your studies to the next level?


JLPT (Japanese Language Proficiency Test) is a test organized by Japan Educational Exchanges and Services (JEES). It has become the standardized way to assess one's Japanese language ability. The test mostly focuses on listening and reading.


The JLPT test was revised back in 2010, and since then there has been a total of 5 levels for the test: N5, N4, N3, N2 and N1 (in order of difficulty).


This course focuses on the JLPT N2 level test. JLPT N2 is the framework from which this course is built, and the real focus of the course is to improve the student's Japanese language reading ability. That being said, the course also contains example conversations with scripts included.


If you want to learn JLPT N2 kanji + grammar and practice your Japanese language reading skills, and do it all in an efficient manner, then this course is for you!


It is an upper-intermediate level course. The student should be familiar with hiragana and katakana before taking it, as there will only be minimal use of romaji in this course.

title: The Complete IELTS General Training Course: For Band 7+
description:
Are you determined to achieve a Band 7+ in the IELTS General Training exam? This comprehensive course is your ultimate resource for mastering all four sections—Writing, Speaking, Listening, and Reading—with expert strategies designed to help you succeed. Whether you're preparing for immigration, employment, or enhancing your English proficiency, this course provides the tools and techniques you need to reach your goals.

In the Writing section, you'll learn how to craft high-scoring letters and essays, focusing on task response, coherence, grammar, and vocabulary. We provide step-by-step guidance on how to structure your answers to meet the IELTS exam criteria, ensuring you can confidently tackle any writing task.

The Speaking section covers essential techniques to improve your fluency, pronunciation, and coherence. You'll practice speaking on a variety of topics, with tips on how to develop your ideas and express them clearly, helping you stand out in the IELTS Speaking test.

In the Listening section, you’ll develop skills to quickly identify key information and answer questions accurately, even in complex scenarios. We’ll guide you through practice exercises that mirror the IELTS Listening exam, ensuring you're prepared for every question type.

The Reading section focuses on improving your comprehension and time management. You'll learn how to efficiently navigate through passages and accurately respond to a wide range of questions, from multiple-choice to true/false/not given.

This course not only equips you with test-taking strategies but also enhances your overall English language skills. Through practical exercises, detailed feedback, and continuous practice, you'll boost your vocabulary, grammar, and critical thinking—all essential for achieving a high score in the IELTS General Training exam.

By the end of this course, you’ll have the knowledge, strategies, and confidence needed to achieve a Band 7+ in the IELTS General Training exam. Enroll now and start your journey towards IELTS success!

title: Burmese Common Particles | Explained
description:
This 15 Most Common Particles course focuses on learning the particles and their usage in Burmese. This course will guide you slowly how to use each and every particles in the sentence properly. And, this course slowly teaches you all 15 Burmese particles by building small sentences. In this course, you are going to learn these common particles: က, ကို, မှာ, ကော, လည်း, နဲ့, ပါ, တယ်, မယ်, လား, လဲ, တဲ့အခါ, နေတုန်း, ပြီးခဲ့တဲ့ and နောက်. By the end of the course, you will be able to start speaking Burmese confidently using those particles in a proper way.

Those above particles are very common and used a lot in the every situations. Therefore, we are going to practice it in the command situation sentences. Then, you will understand how and where we are using it commonly. Another important thing is most of the particles are used with the Noun, some of them works with the Verb. Finally, you will understand clearly which particles are used with noun and which particles are used with verb.

By the end of the course, you will be able to know how to use the common particles in the sentence. This Burmese Common Particles Course will continue to be updated with more video lectures and content in the future.

title: Chinese for School Life: Sentences from Classroom to Campus
description:
Unlock the world of Chinese school life with this comprehensive and engaging course! Whether you’re a beginner or looking to expand your conversational skills, this course is designed to help you confidently navigate everyday situations in a Chinese-speaking school environment.

Through 400+ carefully selected and graded sentences, you’ll learn how to:

  • Greet teachers and classmates, introduce yourself, and make friends

  • Ask and answer questions about classes, schedules, and school routines

  • Express your likes, dislikes, and opinions about subjects, activities, and events

  • Participate in classroom discussions, group projects, and extracurricular activities

  • Handle real-life scenarios such as exams, homework, competitions, and school events

  • Communicate effectively with teachers, classmates, and parents

Each sentence is chosen to reflect authentic school life, progressing from simple to more advanced structures. You’ll encounter a variety of sentence types—statements, questions, and commands—covering topics like classroom objects, daily routines, sports, arts, science, clubs, and more. The course is suitable for learners of all ages, from primary school to university, and is perfect for self-study, classroom use, or as a supplementary resource.

What you’ll get:

  • 400+ practical sentences for immediate use in school settings

  • Exposure to a wide range of vocabulary and grammar patterns

  • Thematic progression from easy to challenging content

  • Culturally relevant language for real communication

  • A solid foundation for further Chinese study and HSK preparation

Who is this course for?

  • Students preparing to study in a Chinese-speaking school

  • Teachers seeking classroom-ready materials

  • Parents supporting their children’s Chinese learning

  • Anyone interested in mastering practical, everyday Chinese

Start your journey to fluency in Chinese school life—one sentence at a time!

title: English for Football (Soccer) Course: Premium Version
description:
What is Football English?

The English for Football Course is a language learning programme designed specifically for football fans, soccer players, referees, coaches, managers and directors of football teams who need to communicate confidently and fluently in language about the beautiful game.

You will learn football English vocabulary that is crucial to helping you play or watch a football match with friends. You will study complex language such as idioms, expressions and phrasal verbs that will help you to understand native English language speakers people when talking about soccer.

What can I expect from Football English?

  • Vocabulary exercises for learners of English who want to talk about football (soccer) in English with confidence and fluency.

  • Designed for football fans, players, managers, referees, reporters, administrators and coaches.

  • An English language course designed by a coach with an overwhelming passion for the beautiful game all his life who has visited hundreds of football grounds and watched thousands of football games.

  • Access to an English language teacher who has taught football players such as Eric Lamela and Andrei Arshavin as well as elite managers such as Paulo Sousa and Mauricio Pochettino.

  • Suitable for students of English who are at B1 level or above.

  • Lifetime's access to the Football English course for no additional fee

Michael Davies is a teacher of English as a Foreign Language who has worked in this field for over twenty years. He has taught top football players and Premier League and MLS football managers. The English for Football Course consolidates over twenty years of knowledge into a series of lessons that would cost thousands of dollars if taken face-to-face in a classroom.

The many exercises in this course are designed to help you consolidate the vocabulary you already know and use the language within the appropriate context or introduce you to new language in a relevant and productive way.

By the end of the course, you should:

  • Be able to talk confidently about football matches and players

  • Understand colloquial British English football phrases

  • Be able to read a football report in a British newspaper

  • Comprehend football analysts and commentators

title: Essential Romanian: Beginners' Journey
description:
Designed for beginners, this comprehensive course takes you on a step-by-step exploration of Romanian language. This course covers everything you need to know: words you'll use every day, handy phrases, how to talk about your routines and what you do, plus the basics and important parts of grammar, all explained in a way that's easy to understand.

Essential Vocabulary and Pronunciation

  • Build a strong foundation by learning common everyday words and phrases.

  • Master accurate pronunciation through interactive exercises.

Grammar Fundamentals

  • Explore the fundamental aspects of Romanian grammar, including noun and adjective gender, verb conjugation, and sentence structure.

  • Practice constructing simple sentences and vocabulary.

Hobbies, Activities, Travel, Food and more

  • Explore vocabulary and phrases to discuss hobbies, interests, and free time activities.

  • Improve your vocabulary.

By the end of the "Essential Romanian: Beginners' Journey" course, you will have gained a solid foundation in the Romanian language, enabling you to engage in simple conversations, navigate common situations and being able to make conversations with your friends.

Whether you're planning a trip to Romania, connecting with Romanian-speaking friends and family, or simply exploring a new language, this course is your gateway to a wonderful learning journey. Are you ready to start this journey?

title: Latvian in 10 Hours - All the Basics You Need
description:
Ever dreamed of exploring enchanting Riga, connecting with Latvian people, or simply broadening your linguistic horizons? My "Latvian in 10 Hours" course will help make that dream a reality! This isn't just about learning words; it's about opening doors to a vibrant culture and fascinating new experiences.

In about 10 hours of study, you'll embark on an exciting journey from absolute beginner to confidently navigating basic Latvian. The course kicks things off by demystifying the alphabet and reading rules, giving you the keys to unlocking Latvian sounds. From there, you'll quickly master essential greetings and self-introductions, so you can start connecting right away.

You'll gain practical skills for real-life situations, like handling numbers, shopping, and ordering delicious food at a restaurant. The course equips you with the vocabulary to chat about your family, hobbies, and interests, and even discuss daily routines, time, and and dates. Plus, you'll pick up vital phrases for travel and gain a fascinating glimpse into Latvian society and culture.

By the end of this course, you won't just have a collection of phrases, you'll have a genuine connection to the Latvian language and the confidence to use it. Ready to embark on this exciting linguistic adventure?

title: The Complete IELTS Course: Achieve 7+ Band Score
description:
Are you determined to achieve your target IELTS band score and unlock new opportunities for education, career, or immigration? The Complete IELTS Course is designed to guide you through every aspect of the IELTS exam with expert instruction, proven strategies, and extensive practice materials for both Academic and General tests.

This course covers all four sections of the IELTS—Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking—ensuring you’re fully prepared to tackle each component with confidence. You’ll learn essential techniques for understanding complex texts, answering tricky questions, and crafting high-scoring essays. In the Speaking section, you’ll receive targeted guidance on improving your pronunciation, fluency, and confidence.

Key features of the course include:

  • In-Depth Lessons: Comprehensive coverage of IELTS exam strategies and skills.

  • Real Practice Tests: Full-length, timed practice tests that replicate the actual exam experience.

  • Personalized Feedback: Constructive feedback on assignments to help you refine your approach and boost your score.

  • Flexible Learning: Study at your own pace with 24/7 access to high-quality lessons and materials.

Whether you're a beginner or looking to improve a previous IELTS score, this course is your complete guide to IELTS success. Join today and take the first step toward achieving your goals!

title: Mastering Business English for Professional Networking
description:
Welcome to "Mastering Business English for Professional Networking," a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the essential skills and confidence needed to excel in your professional networking endeavors. In today’s fast-paced business world, effective networking is key to unlocking opportunities and building meaningful relationships. This course will guide you through the nuances of networking in a business context, focusing on the language and communication techniques necessary for success.

Throughout this course, you will explore the importance of networking, the art of making impactful introductions, and the strategies for crafting a compelling elevator pitch. You’ll learn essential vocabulary and phrases that will help you communicate effectively, whether you’re attending a networking event, engaging in virtual meetings, or connecting with industry leaders on social media platforms like LinkedIn and Twitter.

In addition, we’ll cover practical tips for engaging with others, maintaining professionalism, and following up after initial conversations. You’ll also discover the significance of building your online presence and personal brand, ensuring that you stand out in the competitive business landscape.

With interactive exercises and real-world scenarios, you will have the opportunity to practice your networking skills in a supportive environment. By the end of this course, you’ll feel empowered to navigate professional interactions with confidence, enabling you to foster valuable connections and advance your career.

Join me, Dan Mill, as we embark on this journey to master the art of business networking. Enroll now and take the first step towards enhancing your networking skills and expanding your professional horizons!

title: Learn Daily Spanish and Latin American Idioms with Examples
description:
More than 300 Spanish Idioms that will help you learn common idiomatic expressions used by native Spanish speakers.

This course is for you if you want to improve your understanding of idioms and learn to use them confidently. The lessons follow the following methodology:

We are going to introduce each Spanish idiom, on a separate slide which consists of the following parts:

  • The new Spanish expression.

  • The literally translation.

  • Its meaning in English.

  • Two images that illustrate the word that we are focusing on and its main meaning.

  • Finally, we present examples showing and explaining how to use the new Spanish idiom or expression.

This five-step method is an effective way to learn idioms because you interact more actively with each expression and you can put them into practice in your own Spanish.

The idioms course contains more than 60 lessons, so if you want to improve your understanding of idioms and learn to use them confidently, this course is for you.

This course is designed for beginners who want to learn Persian in a clear, structured, and engaging way. visible_instructors.title: David Yao
visible_instructors.name: David

description:
Latest Updates: HSK 7-9 V2021 OFFICIAL MOCK PDF Sample book is uploaded into Lecture 1, resource section.

20230212


Nearly 15 months after the release of the "Standard", HSK 7-9 was held for the first time in the world on November 26, 2022. There are 41 questions in total for HSK 7-9, which comprehensively test candidates’ five language skills of listening, speaking, reading, writing and translating. The test paper is divided into five parts: listening, reading, writing, translation and speaking. Based on our more than 20 years of experience in teaching Chinese as a foreign language and developing courses, we made a brief analysis of HSK 7-9 in the first place.

We will give detail explanations on the HSK 7-9 examination structure, the question format, topics areas etc.


Here are partial of the "Standard"

Approved by the National Language Commission’s Language Standardization and Standards Review Committee, the "International Chinese Education Chinese Level Standards" (GF0025-2021) (hereinafter referred to as "Standards") was recently released by the Ministry of Education and the National Language Working Committee as the language of the National Language Commission The text specification will be formally implemented on July 1, 2021.

The "Standard" divides learners' Chinese proficiency into "three grades and nine levels", and uses the four basic elements of syllables, Chinese characters, vocabulary, and grammar to form a "four-dimensional benchmark", which is formed by verbal communication skills, topic task content and language quantitative indicators Three evaluation dimensions, with Chinese listening, speaking, reading, writing, and translation as the five language skills, so as to accurately calibrate the learner's Chinese proficiency.

title: Business English Course For English Language Students
description:
Business English For International Students


This course was created to help international student who are wanting to learn a more formal way of communication. Students who would like to enter academic classes such as University or Childcare or start a business as an example, but they don't have much formal vocabulary, which is needed for things such as presentations, group meetings and much more. If that is you, then this is the course for you.

My course is very different from the others. I am a real IELTS English Language teacher working in an international school in Australia. I have had a lot a great feedback from students, who felt that what I teach them is very useful real life lessons. I am very well know for being a PASSIONATE teacher and I NEVER give up on my students. The way I teach is different from others, I try to explain difficult things in an easier way, because I know and understand that it is very difficult for international students to learn English at an academic level, like Business English.  

This course is a MUST for anyone wanting to improve their level of Speaking, in order to sound more professional with nice, full and impressive answers.   

I have provided everything I know and given 100 percent to create this course for you. So that it is easy enough for you to understand with many examples.   

Real business questions are in my course, which have my professional example answers, using the vocabulary taught in this course.

In this course you will learn absolutely everything there is to know about how to sound professional and more formal when you speak. You will also be given useful go tos which can help to build up your formal vocabulary and knowledge a lot more.

You will learn must know strategies (ways) to keep talking, even if you have finished everything you wanted to say and the person you are talking to is expecting you to continue talking. You will be given a quiz to review the vocabulary, idioms, linking words and grammatical structures taught in the course.  

You will also be taught, how to get yourself out of trouble, when you have been going on and on about a topic and the person you are talking to is getting bored or knows that you are possibly off topic.

visible_instructors.name: Vietlingo

description:
Welcome to our comprehensive Travel Vietnamese section! In this course, we have curated an extensive range of topics to equip you with essential language skills for various travel situations. Get ready to embark on your Vietnamese language journey and make the most out of your trip to Vietnam!

Here's a glimpse of the topics covered in this course:

  1. AT THE AIRPORT - Ở SÂN BAY TẠI: Learn how to navigate the airport, communicate with airport personnel, and handle common travel procedures such as check-in and boarding.

  2. AT THE CHECK-IN COUNTER AND ISSUES RELATED TO LUGGAGE - QUẦY CHECK IN VÀ VẤN ĐỀ VỀ HÀNH LÝ: Familiarize yourself with vocabulary related to checking in, handling luggage, and resolving any issues that may arise during your travel.

  3. AT THE HOTEL - TẠI KHÁCH SẠN: Discover useful phrases for hotel reservations, checking in and out, and effectively communicating with hotel staff to ensure a comfortable stay.

  4. AT A TRAVEL AGENCY - TẠI CÔNG TY DU LỊCH: Learn how to interact with travel agents, discuss travel itineraries, and obtain valuable information to enhance your travel experience.

  5. AT THE HOSPITAL - TẠI BỆNH VIỆN: Acquire essential medical vocabulary, understand how to describe symptoms, and communicate with healthcare professionals in case of emergencies or medical assistance.

  6. GO SHOPPING - ĐI MUA SẮM: Master the language of bargaining, asking for prices, and expressing your preferences while exploring local markets and shops.

  7. AT THE RESTAURANT - Ở NHÀ HÀNG: Immerse yourself in Vietnamese culinary experiences by learning how to order food, interact with restaurant staff, and express dietary preferences or allergies.

  8. AT THE POLICE STATION - Ở ĐỒN CẢNH SÁT: Familiarize yourself with phrases to seek assistance from the police, report incidents, or handle any legal matters that may arise during your travel.

  9. AT A BAR - Ở QUÁN BAR: Enhance your social experiences by discovering phrases related to ordering drinks, engaging in conversations, and enjoying the vibrant nightlife in Vietnam.

  10. AT A TRAIN STATION - Ở GA XE LỬA: Navigate train travel with confidence by learning how to purchase tickets, ask for train schedules, and communicate with station staff.

Our Travel Vietnamese course is more than just a phrase book. It's a collection of interactive exercises carefully designed to prepare you for a wide range of travel-related situations. By practicing with our exercises, you'll develop practical language skills that will enable you to communicate effectively and confidently during your trip.

Whether you're a beginner or already have some knowledge of Vietnamese, these lessons are tailored to meet the needs of travelers like you. Take advantage of the audio files featuring native Vietnamese speakers, which will enhance your listening skills and provide an authentic experience of the language.

So, before you embark on your journey, click on any of the exercises below and start practicing Vietnamese. Make your trip to Vietnam truly unforgettable by immersing yourself in the local culture and confidently communicating your needs and desires in Vietnamese!
